newsNm: Gugudan Reveals Comeback Photos for Hana, Nayoung and Mimi
newsDesc:
20170216/17427825.jpgThe first members to be featured include Hana, Nayoung and Mimi. Each member is seen in their own teaser image and are posing with a variety of props.


Hana, Nayoung and Mimi are wearing matching pink ang black dresses as they pose while gazing into the camera. The props, which include a chess set, tea set and a cut-out heart, raise curiosity to the concept of their upcoming title track A Girl Like Me.


Meanwhile, Gugudan will be back with their 2nd mini album Act.2 Narcissus and title track A Girl Like Me on February 28.

newsDesc:
‘勢’Jessi(28歲)和韓裔美國籍的饒舌歌手Jonathan Park(30歲)已分手!

Jessi今天(16日)被爆與Jonathan Park熱戀，正在談遠距離戀愛，?所屬的YMC娛樂與本人確認後，對外表示:“兩人已經分手了，經紀公司不知道確切的時間。分手後，專心於各自的工作。

Jessi於2015年出演Mne《Unpretty Rapstar》，從此?露頭角，敢露敢言經常受邀上綜藝節目，曾坦承做過?胸整形。 20170216/11258402.jpg照片來源:Jonathan Park SNS

newsNm: Block B′s ′Yesterday′ Tops Gaon′s Weekly Chart
newsDesc:
Block B has reached number 1 on Gaon Chart′s weekly chart with Yesterday.


According to Gaon Music Chart, Block B′s Yesterday reached number 1 on their weekly Digital Songs chart and Download chart for the 6th week of 2017. Ailee′s I Will Go to You Like the First Snow was ranked number 1 on the Streaming chart. 20170216/21241506.jpgAdditionally, NCT DREAM was listed at number 1 on the Albums Chart with their new album The First - The 1st Single Album and Twice reached number 1 on the Social Chart with track TT.


On Weibo′s chart for k-pop artists in the group and individual categories, BTS and Lee Min Ho were listed at number 1, respectively.


Meanwhile, Block B released the new track Yesterday on February 6 and acheived an all-kill on Korean real-time music charts as soon as it was released. The track is especially gaining attentio as it was composed by member Park Kyung.


Photo credit: Seven Seasons Entertainment
showTitle: Block B′s ′Yesterday′ Tops Gaon′s Weekly Chart

newsNm: [Video] EXO′s Suho Releases 2nd ′Starlight′ Music Video
newsDesc:
EXO′s Suho has released the second music video for Starlight the OST to his drama Star of the Universe.


On February 16, the second music video for Starlight, the OST To MBC drama Star of the Universe and was first released on February 10, was shared through a variety of music platforms. 20170216/59688778.jpgThe newly released music video contrasts from the sad theme of the first music video as it shows the love and happiness that the two main characters share. Scenes shown through the new music video include hugging, kisses on the forehead and wedding scenes.


Starlight was written, composed and arranged by music veteran Jung Ji Chan and was performed by Suho and Remi. Jung Ji Chan, who has hit the 20th year since his debut, is preparing a variety of projects for 2017 including new music and concerts.


Meanwhile, Suho also recently released new track Curtain with pianist Song Young Ju. The track marked the final track to the first season of SM Entertainment′s STATION.





Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] EXO′s Suho Releases 2nd ′Starlight′ Music Video

newsNm: 劉亞仁好冤！ 不是逃兵是罹患骨瘤
newsDesc:
以電影《思悼》拿下?龍?影帝寶座的劉亞仁（30歲），至今仍未確定入伍日期，昨天(15日)被爆無法入伍的原因是因?罹患骨瘤，所屬的經紀公司隨後發表官方聲明，證實他正與骨瘤搏?中。

經紀公司表示:“因?涉及敏感的私人問題，病情不能說是?嚴重、但也不能說是不嚴重，正在等待複檢中。”

據悉，他的病因是2013年拍電影《?哲》受傷，右肩肌肉破裂所致，接受3次體檢時兵務廳作出:“上腕骨頭內囊腫需要再觀察及接受病理檢?。”的判斷。

劉亞仁於2015年接受第1次入伍參軍體檢以來，截至去年12月共接受了共3次體檢，但每次體檢結果都是需要複檢，因此有網友批評他逃避兵役。如今?相大白，無不盼望他能?戰勝病魔。 照片來源:eNEWS DB

newsNm: I.O.I5年後重組？ 金素慧：絕對不會失敗的!
newsDesc:
限定女團I.O.I出身的金素慧（17歲），上個月底結束組合的活動後，積極轉型當演員，?今天(16日)接受韓媒訪問時，透露未來發展方向。

?說:“目前，我想把心力放在演?上。還有?多不足的部?，但我必須相信自己。希望我練習演技時，能?感受到自己做的到。我對演??有野心，應該是因?個性?敏感也?多慮的關係?!”

I.O.I成員們說好5年後重組，?對此表示:“重組?對不會失敗的，有成員缺席的話就是叛徒。我當然相信會再聚在一起，‘5年後’的話，可能一半是認?、一半是玩笑，但現在對我們來說是?迫切的事。那是我們也是粉絲的心願。”、 “成員們5年後可能都有了一席之地，希望到時全員能?站在一起。” 照片來源:許正珉 記者

newsNm: [Video] K.A.R.D′s ′Don′t Recall′ MV Hits 1 Million Views in Record Speed
newsDesc:
Rookie co-ed group K.A.R.D has hit 1 million views in record speed with the music video for new track Don′t Recall.


On February 16, DSP Media′s new group K.A.R.D released their 2nd project single album Don′t Recall through a variety of music sites. All attention is on the new group as the music video for title track Don′t Recall hit 1 million views in record speed. Additionally, fans from all over the world are sharing reaction videos while watching K.A.R.D′s Don′t Recall through YouTube as well as following the point dance moves.


K.A.R.D′s new track Don′t Recall tells the love story between a woman who is still holding onto pain and a man who doesn′t want to let her go. It is an EDM track with dancehall beats that follows the story of K.A.R.D′s debut track Oh NaNa.


At the time of it′s release, Oh NaNa also showed huge success by reaching over 8 million views without special promotions. K.A.R.D was listed on both Billboard′s 10 Best New K-Pop Groups In 2016 and on their Top 5 K-Pop Artists to Watch in 2017.


Meanwhile, K.A.R.D is DSP Media′s first rookie co-ed group with the concept of King, Ace, jokeR and hiDDen to make up the group name K.A.R.D. It consists of male members J.Seph, B.M and female members Somin and Jiwoo.






Photo credit: DSP Media
showTitle: [Video] K.A.R.D′s ′Don′t Recall′ MV Hits 1 Million Views in Record Speed

newsNm: Twice′s Momo, Dahyun and Chaeyong Pose for Final Individual Comeback Photos
newsDesc:
Twice′s Momo, Dahyun and Chaeyong have been featured in new comeback photos.


On February 16, Twice′s agency JYP Entertainment released teaser images featuring members Momo, Dahyun and Chaeyong through their official SNS channels. Twice, who has been releasing individual comeback photos for the members since February 14, have released the final set of individual images Momo, Dahyun and Chaeyong′s cuts.


In the revealed images, the 3 members show their individual charm while posing next to the bright red door that′s been making an appearance in every photo. Momo is seen hiding behind the door, Dahyun is knocking on the door and Chaeyong is seen reaching for the knocker.


Twice′s upcoming new track Knock Knock is expected to be another hit following their widely successful tracks Like OOH-AHH, Cheer Up and most recent release TT.


Meanwhile, Twice is set to make a comeback with their new album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 on February 20. A few days before their album release, Twice will be holding their concert TWICE 1st Tour Twiceland -The Opening- from February 17-19.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment 20170216/98049479.jpg20170216/40545106.jpg20170216/54513472.jpg
showTitle: Twice′s Momo, Dahyun and Chaeyong Pose for Final Individual Comeback Photos

newsNm: EXID Thanks Fans While Celebrating 5th Anniversary
newsDesc:
Girl group EXID has thanked their fans while celebrating the 5th year since their debut.


On February 16, EXID shared a photo through their official SNS channels with the message, "It′s been 5 years since EXID′s has been known by the world! Thanks to #LEGGO for endless love and support to make this possible! Let′s be with EXID all year around #spring_summer_fall_winter ! #Solji_LE_Hani_Hyerin_Junghwa."

The revealed photo shows a card with hand written messages from EXID members to their fans. Even Solji, who has recently taken a break from activities after being diagnosed with hyperthyroidism, took the time to thank the fans.


Solji wrote, "Leggos that I love. Everyone is doing well, right? Congratulations on EXID′s 5th year anniversary. I have been so thankful throughout the years that words can not express. And I think it will continue to be that way. Let′s always be together. I miss you very much. I′ll get well soon and go to see our Leggos. I love you."


Following Solji, each member thanked their fans and showed their love for the fans who have been supporting them throughout the years.


Meanwhile, EXID debuted on February 16, 2012 with the single Whoz That Girl.


Photo credit: Banana Culture
showTitle: EXID Thanks Fans While Celebrating 5th Anniversary

newsNm: TWICE多賢、Momo、彩瑛露齒燦笑 ONCE嘴角瞬間上揚
newsDesc:
出道15個月的人氣女團TWICE，繼《Cheer Up》及《TT》兩首大受歡迎後，將於本月20日推出特別專輯《TWICEcoaster: LANE 2》，JYP娛樂今天(16日)公開Momo、多賢和彩瑛以黃色及橙色?主題的回歸預告照。

個人預告照中，Momo、多賢和彩瑛分別穿橫紋長襪、網襪搭配低?高筒靴，露出?纖合度的蜜大腿，只見?們作勢敲門，露出迷人笑容，讓ONCE(粉絲名稱)的嘴角都不禁上揚。 特別專輯《TWICEcoaster: LANE 2》是《TWICEcoaster: LANE 1》的改版專輯，包含主打歌曲《KNOCK KNOCK》共13首歌曲，其中《TT》的TAK Remix版本及《Like OOH-AHH》、《Cheer Up》、《TT》的Inst.版本僅收錄於實體專輯中，勾起ONCE(粉絲名)的收藏慾。 20170216/98049479.jpg20170216/40545106.jpg20170216/54513472.jpg照片來源:JYP娛樂

newsNm: Victon to Hold Fan Meeting to Commemorate 100 Days
newsDesc:
Rookie boy group Victon is holding a special fan meeting to commemorate 100 days since their debut.


Victon′s agency Plan A Entertainment revealed that Victon will be holding a mini fan meeting to commemorate 100 days since their debut on February 16. Prior to the fan meeting, Victon selected fans for the event through attendance stamps, survey participation and a photo event.
Previously on February 10, Victon surprised fans by sharing news of a February comeback through a Naver V live broadcast. At the time, Victon also shared, "It′s almost our 100 days since debuting. We are trying to plan a special date as we have joyfully reached our 100 days thanks to your love."


They continued, "We think it will be a great time for us to eat good food and share what we′ve been up to these days. We want to do anything our fans want."


Meanwhile, Victon plans to create special memories with their fans through their 100 days mini fan meeting. They plan to share stories and hope to grow closer to the fans through the event.


Photo credit: Plan A Entertainment
showTitle: Victon to Hold Fan Meeting to Commemorate 100 Days

newsNm: BTS Sets Another New Record with ′Spring Day′
newsDesc:
BTS has set yet another new record.


The music video for BTS′ new track Spring Day, which was released on February 13, reached over 20 million views within 87 hours and 50 minutes. This is a new record for a Korean idol group. Accordingly, BTS became the fastest k-pop group to reach 10 million views as well as the fastest to reach 20 million views.


Additionally, as of February 16, the music video for Spring Day swept iTunes′ Music Video Charts around the world by ranking number 1 in the US, UK, Canada, Singapore, Indonesia and Thailand.


BTS is also showing huge success as 4 tracks from their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone reached iTunes′ Songs Chart within the Top 30. Title track Spring Day reached number 8, Not Today reached number 11, A Supplementary Story: You Never Walk Alone reached number 20 and track Outro: Wings is listed at number 30.


Meanwhile, BTS released their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone on February 13 and has swept Korean music charts with title track Spring Day. The group will be performing tracks from their new album for the first time on stage at their Wings Tour Seoul Concert on February 18-19.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS Sets Another New Record with ′Spring Day′

newsNm: [Video] Red Velvet′s ′Rookie′ Takes Home ′M COUNTDOWN′ Win
newsDesc:
Red Velvet has taken home the M COUNTDOWN win with Rookie.


On the February 16 episode of Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN, Red Velvet competed against Akdong Musician for the win and ultimately won the trophy with their performance of title track Rookie. Accordingly, Red Velvet, who has won trophies on with SBS MTV′s The Show, MBC Music′s Show Champion and SBS′ Inkigayo with Rookie, continues to sweep music program wins.


Upon winning, Red Velvet shared, "Lee Soo Man and our SM family, thank you. We want to thank everyone who helped us stand on this stage."


Additionally, other performers of the night included Dream Catcher, MASK, Melody Day, VARSITY, B.I.G, Beatwin, Rania, Bigflo, Shin Ji Hoon, CLC, I, SF9, April, NCT DREAM, NCT 127 and more.


Meanwhile, last night′s M COUNTDOWN win marks Red Velvet′s second week in a row taking home the M COUNTDOWN trophy with Rookie.





Photo credit: Mnet ′M COUNTDOWN′ screen capture
showTitle: [Video] Red Velvet′s ′Rookie′ Takes Home ′M COUNTDOWN′ Win

newsNm: Twice to Appear on ′Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook′
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice is set to appear on KBS2′s Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook.


It has been revealed that Twice will be making an appearance on the February 25 episode of Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook. This will mark the girl group′s first variety program appearance after releasing their upcoming special album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2, which will be releasing on February 20. Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook has been having special monthly episodes produced around a concept and the episode that Twice is set to appear on will have the concept, "Songs I want to sing for those in their 20s." In addition to Twice, the lineup for the episode will also include John Park, Akdong Musician, Thomas Cook, Kim Jong Min and Sweet Sorrow.


Fans can see Twice′s first variety program appearance with TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 on February 25 through Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook.


Meanwhile, Twice is set to make a comeback with their new album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 on February 20. A few days before their album release, Twice will be holding their concert TWICE 1st Tour Twiceland -The Opening- from February 17-19.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice to Appear on ′Yoo Hee Yeol′s Sketchbook′

newsNm: [Video] Twice Raises Expectations for Comeback with ′Knock Knock′ Teaser Video
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice has risen the expectations for their comeback with the release of Knock Knock′s teaser video.


On February 17, Twice′s agency JYP Entertainment revealed the teaser video to Twice′s upcoming title track Knock Knock. The teaser video is especially gaining attention as it continues from the story revealed through title track TT of their album TWICEcoaster: Lane 1 from 2016.


At the time, TT′s music video ended with the sound of a knock and the words, "To be continued." Accordingly, the teaser video for Knock Knock continued by beginning with the sound of a knock.


Upon hearing the knock, the members of Twice run down the stairs and joyfully greet someone who is at the door. The same door revealed through Twice′s teaser images makes an appearance, raising curiosity for the door′s role in the story.


Meanwhile, Twice will be releasing their special album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 through a variety of music sites on February 20.





Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Twice Raises Expectations for Comeback with ′Knock Knock′ Teaser Video

newsNm: JunggiGo to Collaborate with EXO′s Chan Yeol for Upcoming Duet
newsDesc:
Artist JunggiGo will be collaborating with EXO′s Chan Yeol for an upcoming duet.


On February 23, JunggiGo and Chan Yeol will be releasing the single Let Me Love You. Let Me Love You was completed to perfection even in the midst of both JunggiGo and Chan Yeol′s busy schedules. The project was especially meaningful as the pair is known to have a close friendship.


Prior to news of the single being shared, JunggiGo gained attention after sharing part of the lyrics to Let Me Love You with the hashtag, "#letmeloveyou," through his personal SNS. JunggiGo and Chan Yeol first connected through social media and began to build a friendship by going to concerts together and meeting with mutual friends.


Meanwhile, JunggiGo and Chan Yeol′s new single Let Me Love You will be released through a variety of music sites on February 23.


Photo credit: Starship Entertainment
showTitle: JunggiGo to Collaborate with EXO′s Chan Yeol for Upcoming Duet

newsNm: 【影片】Knock Knock！ TWICE在家嗎？
newsDesc:

newsNm: SHINee to Hold First Solo North America Tour
newsDesc:
Male idol group SHINee is holding their first North America Tour.


On February 17, SHINEe′s agency SM Entertainment revealed that the group will be touring North America with their concert SHINee CONCERT ‘SHINee WORLD V′ beginning in Toronto on March 19 followed by concerts in Vancouver on March 21, Dallas on March 24 and Los Angeles on March 26. While SHINee gained huge praise after touring Mexico, Chile and Argentina in 2014, the upcoming North America tour will mark SHINee′s first time holding a solo concert in Canada and the US. Previously, SHINee received the love of American fans while visiting Chicago and Dallas through their fan meeting in May and July of last year.


Ticketing for SHINee′s North America Tour SHINee CONCERT ‘SHINee WORLD V′ will open on February 25 and are expected to sell fast.


Meanwhile, SHINee is currently touring Japan with SHINee WORLD 2017. They began in Fukui on January 28-29 and plan to hold a total of 25 concerts across 10 cities in Japan including Kobe, Osaka, Tokyo, Nagoya and more.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SHINee to Hold First Solo North America Tour

newsNm: BTOB Confirmed to Release New Album in March
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTOB has announced their upcoming new album.


On February 17, BTOB′s agency Cube Entertainment shared that BTOB′s March comeback is confirmed. The upcoming album comes only 4 months since their promotions with I′ll Be Your Man in November 2016.

BTOB′s upcoming album is expected to be a mini album and new tracks from the album are planned to be showcased in their fan meeting.


Meanwhile, on March 5 at Korea University′s Hwajeong Stadium in Seoul, BTOB will be hold an event for their official fan club, MELODY, called BTOB′s Secret Room. Fans are especially showing interest as tickets immediately sold out as soon as they were available.


Currently, BTOB is working hard to prepare for both the fan meeting and the last stages of the album.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: BTOB Confirmed to Release New Album in March

newsNm: miss A′s Suzy to Release Collaboration With Park Won
newsDesc:
Singer Park Won and miss A′s Suzy will release a collaboration song at the end of the month.


On February 17, Park Won′s agency MakeUs Entertainment announced that the recording of the collaboration song is complete and it will be released along with the music video in late February.

Prior to the announcement, Park Won and Suzy shared a photo through their respective social media accounts of the pair spending time in a recording studio. It is known that their new collaboration song is a song about love.


Park Won debuted through the group One More Chance in 2010. The group found success with track I Think About You and Park Won gained also gained attention as a solo artist with his 2015 solo album Like A Wonder.


Additionally, Park Won is currently promoting his 2nd album 1/24, which was released last November, while Suzy recently released her solo album Yes? No? last month while continuing her acting career.


Photo credit: Park Won and Suzy SNS
showTitle: miss A′s Suzy to Release Collaboration With Park Won

newsNm: Lee Min Ho Prepares New Single Album for Fans
newsDesc:
Top hallyu actor Lee Min Ho is returning to fans as an artist.


On February 17, according to Lee Min Ho′s agency MYM Entertainment, he will release a new single album called Always By LEE MIN HO next month. The upcoming album marks his first release in two years since the release of his last album The Day in 2015. New track Always of Always By LEE MIN HO reflects Lee Min Ho′s love towards his loyal fans and feelings since his debut ten years ago. The producer of his last album, Hwang Chan Hee, has also participated in the production of the new album.


Meanwhile, Lee Min Ho plans to first showcase his new track during a fan meeting at Kyunghee University′s Grand Peace Palace on Feb 18-19.


Photo credit: MYM Entertainment
showTitle: Lee Min Ho Prepares New Single Album for Fans

防彈少年團現正忙於《2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY: EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR》，新歌《春日》和《Not Today》的首個舞台將獻給參加18日首爾場演唱會的粉絲，之後巡?9個國家、11個都市，?辦共19場演唱會，忙碌不在話下。 照片來源:Big Hit娛樂

newsNm: BTS Set to Appear on ′M COUNTDOWN′ for First Music Program Stage
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTS has shared plans for music program promotions with new title track Spring Day.


On February 17, a representative of BTS′ agency Big Hit Entertainment shared, "BTS will go on stage at their first music program through the February 23rd episode of Mnet′s ′M COUNTDOWN.′" They continued by revealing that BTS will continue music program appearances for a week with new title track Spring Day.


Meanwhile, BTS released their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone on February 13 and has swept Korean music charts with title track Spring Day. Beginning with BTS′ Wings Tour Seoul Concert, which will be held on February 18-19, the group will be touring 11 countries around the world and plans to hold 19 concerts.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS Set to Appear on ′M COUNTDOWN′ for First Music Program Stage

newsNm: BTS Successfully Performs First Stage with ′Spring Day′
newsDesc:
BTS has successfully performed their first stage with new title track Spring Day.


On February 18, BTS held their solo concert 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR IN SEOUL with 20,000 fans. They performed a total of 27 tracks and they met fans for the first time in awhile with new album Wings: You Never Walk Along.BTS opened the night with Not Today of Wings: You Never Walk Along and completed the night with new title track Spring Day. J-Hope, who is known to lead the group in choreography, shared before the concert, "′Spring Day′s′ choreography can feel like modern dancing. We tried to express the lyrics through it."


As J-Hope shared, the choreography to Spring Day did not have their typical powerful dance moves, rather, it was a beautiful dance that reflected modern dance.


Meanwhile, with their Seoul concerts as the start, BTS will tour the world visiting a variety of countries including Chile, Brazil, the United States, Thailand, Indonesia, the Philippines, Hong Kong and Brazil.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS Successfully Performs First Stage with ′Spring Day′

newsNm: Former Wonder Girls Member Sunmi Poses for ′Grazia′
newsDesc:
Former Wonder Girls member Sunmi has posed for fashion magazine Grazia.


Sunmi appears in the March issue of Grazia modeling SS looks for fashion brand Sisley.The new magazine spread marks Sunmi′s first since the disbandment of long-time girl group Wonder Girls. Sunmi, who has a reputation for her keen fashion sense, modeled a variety of spring and summer looks with perfection.


In one image, the former girl group member is seen wearing a denim shirt over a laced floral dress. She poses in front of a record store while leaning against an outside display.


Meanwhile, Sunmi′s full spread can be found in the March issue of Grazia.


Photo credit: Grazia
showTitle: Former Wonder Girls Member Sunmi Poses for ′Grazia′

newsNm: GOT7′s Park Jin Young Melts Hearts in ′CeCi′
newsDesc:
GOT7′s Park Jin Young has melted the hearts of fans while posing for CeCi.


Park Jin Young, who appears in the upcoming film A Stray Goat, posed for fashion magazine CeCi to reveal a matured look. Park Jin Young gained attention for his role in recent SBS drama The Legend of the Blue Sea and is raising expectations of fans with his debut film A Stray Goat.


The film follows a boy who visits a village that doesn′t snow and meets a girl with a frozen heart and is opening in theaters in March.


Meanwhile, Park Jin Young′s full photo spread with CeCi can be found in their March issue.


Photo credit: CeCi
showTitle: GOT7′s Park Jin Young Melts Hearts in ′CeCi′

newsNm: AOA′s Seolhyun Featured in ′High Cut′ Magazine
newsDesc:
AOA′s Seolhyun has posed for star style magazine High Cut.


Seolhyun showed off her mysterious gaze in the 192nd issue of High Cut. In the revealed spread, Seohyun captures the attention of fans with her mysterious gaze. She is seen wearing a dark blue blouse and has her hair styled with loose curls.


Seolhyun′s group most recently promoted double title tracks Excuse Me and Bing Bing of their 1st Korean studio album Angel′s Knock, which was released in January.


Meanwhile, Seolhyun′s full photo spread can be found in the 192nd issue of High Cut.


Photo credit: High Cut
showTitle: AOA′s Seolhyun Featured in ′High Cut′ Magazine

newsNm: EXO′s Chanyeol Poses with ′Missing 9′ Co-Star Lee Sun Bin
newsDesc:
EXO′s Chanyeol has posed with Missing 9 co-star Lee Sun Bin.


On February 17, Lee Sun Bin shared a photo of herself and Chanyeol posing through her personal Instagram. In the revealed image, Lee Sun Bin is seen wearing a white evening dress while Chanyeol is wearing an all black suit. They are both holding up the peace sign while smiling into the camera.


Meanwhile, Lee Sun Bin and Chan Yeol are both currently appearing in MBC drama Missing 9.

newsNm: B1A4 Featured in the March Issue of ′Marie Claire′
newsDesc:
B1A4, who swept charts with title track A Lie of their 3rd album Good Timing in November, has been featured in the March issue of fashion magazine Maire Claire.


Through the March issue of Marie Claire, B1A4 not only posed for a spread, but they also revealed their individual charm through the interview.In the revealed photo spread, B1A4 posed for group photos as well as individual cuts. While the group photos revealed the members wearing similar looks, they modeled unique looks for their individual images.


B1A4, who have been busy with individual activities in a variety of areas including dramas and variety programs, most recently promoted their 3rd album Good Timing together.


Meanwhile, B1A4′s full photo spread and interview can be found in the March issue of Marie Claire.


Photo credit: Marie Claire
showTitle: B1A4 Featured in the March Issue of ′Marie Claire′

newsNm: [Video] Twice Sweeps Music Charts With ′Knock Knock′
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice has swept music charts with new title track Knock Knock.


On February 20, Twice released their new special album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 through a variety of music sites. Additionally, the girl group also shared the music video to title track Knock Knock through YouTube.As soon as Knock Knock was released the track reached number 1 on Korea′s top music charts including Melon, Mnet, Olleh Music, Genie, Bugs, Naver Music, Soribada and Monkey3.


The new special album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 includes tracks from their 3rd mini album TWICEcoaster: Lane 1 from last October in addition to two new tracks Knock Knock and Ice Cream.


Twice debuted in October 2015 and proceeded to release hit tracks Like OOH-AHH, Cheer Up and TT. The music videos for all three tracks have surpassed 100 million views and their 3rd album with title track TT recorded sales of over 350,000 copies.


Meanwhile, Twice recently performed their first solo concert on February 17-19 and gathered over 15,000 fans at the SK Olympic Handball Gymnasium.





Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Twice Sweeps Music Charts With ′Knock Knock′

newsNm: [Video] BTS Releases Music Video for ′Not Today′
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTS has released the music video to track Not Today.


On February 20, BTS released the music video to track Not Today of their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone through their official Naver V App and YouTube.Not Today is an addictive moombahton track and the music video features a powerful moombahton dance performance by BTS. On it′s first day of release, the music video has already reached over 5 million views.


Meanwhile, BTS released their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone on February 13 and has swept Korean music charts with title track Spring Day. Beginning with BTS′ Wings Tour Seoul Concert, which was held on February 18-19, the group will be touring 11 countries around the world and plans to hold 19 concerts.





Photo credit: BTS ′Not Today′ MV screen capture
showTitle: [Video] BTS Releases Music Video for ′Not Today′

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon Confirms Release Date of First Studio Album
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon has confirmed the release date of her first solo studio album.


Taeyeon will be releasing her first studio album My Voice on February 28 along with title track Fine. In addition to Fine, the album is said to also include pop ballad, pop R&B and alternative R&B tracks.
In the past, Taeyeon has released a variety of genres through I, a medium tempo pop track; Rain, a jazz track full of soul; Why, a tropical house track; and 11:11, a pop ballad track. The upcoming album is also raising expectations as Taeyeon will be showing her musical range through a variety of genres.


Additionally, leading up to the release of Taeyeon′s album, the singer pre-released the music video for track I Got Love on February 18.


Taeyeon also rose expectations of her upcoming album and title track by releasing a teaser image for Fine on February 20. She has made a complete transformation from the concept of I Got Love.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon′s first solo studio album My Voice and title track Fine are set to release on February 28 through a variety of music sites.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon Confirms Release Date of First Studio Album

newsNm: Lovelyz Pose for Eyecatching Individual Teaser Images
newsDesc:
Girl group Lovelyz, who are awaiting to make a comeback, has posed for individual teaser images for their upcoming album.


On February 20, Lovelyz′s agency Woollim Entertainment released eyecatching individual teaser images of each member through their official SNS channels. In the revealed images, each Lovelyz member is seen wearing a variety of looks and posing in front of bright colored backgrounds. The common theme of each image is their checkered dresses and shirts.


Lovelyz, who are making a comeback on February 27 with their 2nd studio album R U Ready?, have risen the expectations of their return by previously releasing group teaser images and releasing new individual teasers.


Lovelyz′s upcoming studio album comes 10 months since the release of their 2nd mini album A New Trilogy, which was released in April 2016. It also marks their first studio album since the release of their debut album Girls′ Invasion in 2014.


Meanwhile, Lovelyz will hold their showcase and perform the first stage with their 2nd studio album R U Ready? on February 27 at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall.


Photo credit: Woollim Entertainment
showTitle: Lovelyz Pose for Eyecatching Individual Teaser Images

newsNm: miss A′s Suzy and Park Won Pose for Teaser Image of Upcoming Collaboration
newsDesc:
miss A′s Suzy and artist Park Won have released a teaser image for their upcoming collaboration track.


On February 20, Park Won′s agency MakeUs Entertainment shared the teaser image for collaboration track Don′t Wait For Your Love. Don′t Wait For Your Love was written and composed by Park Won and talks about a love story between a guy and a girl.


Park Won debuted through the group One More Chance in 2010. The group found success with track I Think About You and Park Won also gained attention as a solo artist with his 2015 solo album Like A Wonder.


Additionally, Park Won most recently released his 2nd album 1/24 last November while Suzy recently released her solo album Yes? No? last month.

newsDesc:

韓媒今天(20日)爆料，Alex和趙賢榮因各自忙於工作，關係逐漸疏遠，最近已自然分手。隨後趙賢榮透過經紀公司證實，近期已整理好關係，從戀人退回演藝圈前後輩。

趙賢榮的經紀公司表示:“趙賢榮結束Rainbow的活動後，簽進新經紀公司，正準備朝演?等方面發展，生活繁忙。”

Alex、趙賢榮前年10月被爆擦愛火，秘密拍拖1個月，當時兩人透過公司大方認愛，公開交往1年4個月後宣佈分手。 照片來源:eNEWS DB
showTitle: 敗給了太忙 趙賢榮分手大12歲Alex

newsNm: MAMAMOO′s Solar to Release 4th ′Solar Emotion′
newsDesc:
MAMAMOO′s Solar is gifting her fans with Part 4 of Solar Emotion.


On midnight of February 21, Solar will release Person Who Gives Happiness as part of Solar Emotion through a variety of music sites. Solar will be remaking Sun Flower′s Person Who Gives Happiness, which was first released in 1989. The upcoming release of Person Who Gives Happiness is especially meaningful as it will be released on the same day as Solar′s birthday. Solar produced the track while thinking of her family, who are the people that have brought her happines.s


Through Solar′s Solar Emotion project, the artist remakes forgotten songs of the past with her own touch and emotions. She has previously released I Lived Like A Fool, This Moment and In My Dreams.


Meanwhile, Solar will be releasing Part 4 of Solar Emotion, Person Who Gives Happiness, through a variety of music sites on February 21.


Photo credit: RBW
showTitle: MAMAMOO′s Solar to Release 4th ′Solar Emotion′

newsNm: Hyuna Successfully Holds 10 Anniversary Fan Meeting
newsDesc:
Artist Hyuna has succesfully held her 10th anniversary fan meeting.


On February 17, Hyuna met with 200 fans through her 10th anniversary fan meeting Fantopia, HyunA Land.The event was hosted by comedian Kim Kiri and same agency artists CLC, BTOB and Pentagon made a surprise appearance to celebrate Hyuna′s 10th anniversary since debuting.


Hyuna performed a total of 6 tracks during the fan meeting including Morning Glory, How′s This?, Freaky, Red and Bubble Pop!.


Hyuna debuted under girl group Wonder Girls in 2007 and later joined girl group 4Minute, who became famous through hit tracks Hot Issue and <>What′s Your Name? Additionally, Hyuna also maintained a successful solo career by releasing her debut solo track Change in 2010 followed by tracks Bubble Pop, Ice Cream and most recently How′s This?


In addition to her group and solo activities, Hyuna was also active in the musical duo Troublemaker and featured in Psy′s hit track Gangnam Style.


Meanwhile, Hyuna will tour 8 cities in North America beginning in Vancouver on February 22.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: Hyuna Successfully Holds 10 Anniversary Fan Meeting

newsNm: [Video] ASTRO Shares High Medley for Upcoming ′Winter Dream′
newsDesc:
Boy group ASTRO has released a highlight medley video leading up to the release of their special album Winter Dream.


On February 20, ASTRO′s agency Fantagio teased fans of the group′s upcoming album by releasing the highlight medley for Winter Dream.

In the revealed video, a preview of each of the 3 tracks including title track Should Have Held Onto You can be heard. Each track is previewed for 15 seconds and raises the expectations for ASTRO′s upcoming album.


In addition to title track Should Have Held Onto You, Winter Dream will also include a special track to fans titled You and Me and track Cotton Candy.


The upcoming special album Winter Dream completes the group′s four season project. The album follows ASTRO′s previous releases Spring Up, Summer Vibes and Autumn Story.


Meanwhile, ASTRO will show off their new charm through their special album Winter Dream, which will be available beginning February 22.





Photo credit: Fantagio
showTitle: [Video] ASTRO Shares High Medley for Upcoming ′Winter Dream′

newsNm: Dal Shabet′s Subin Drop Cover for ′Circle′s Dream′
newsDesc:
Girl group Dal Shabet′s Subin has shared the cover image for her upcoming project Circle′s Dream.


On February 19, Subin′s agency Happy Face Entertainment released the cover image of the singer′s upcoming project Circle′s Dream through their official SNS channels.


In the revealed photo, Subin looks doll-like as she poses with a red dress, hat and shoes. Subin′s face is covered with her long hair and hat as she leans on a white box.


Meanwhile, Subin debuted as Dal Shabet′s youngest member in 2011. She has not only been actively promoting with the girl group throughout the years, but also known for her solo activities.


Subin will once again show her musical abilities through Circle′s Dream, which is releasing on March 2.


Photo credit: Happy Face Entertainment
showTitle: Dal Shabet′s Subin Drop Cover for ′Circle′s Dream′

newsNm: Jessica Visits Los Angeles with ′Cosmopolitan′
newsDesc:
Jessica has visited Los Angeles with Cosmopolitan.


Jessica, who is known to enjoy traveling, recently traveled to Los Angeles to pose for a photo spread in women′s magazine Cosmopolitan. Jessica is currently working creating new music and will also be appearing in the upcoming film My Other Home: Beijing. Jessica shared regarding her acting, "I am still lacking, but I don′t want to rush things and want to learn whenever the opportunity presents itself."


Meanwhile, Jessica most recently released the album Wonderland in December 2016 and has been holding a variety of concerts and fan meetings. She shared her love for fans by stating, "I want to create, sing and perform good musics for the fans."


Photo credit: Cosmopolitan
showTitle: Jessica Visits Los Angeles with ′Cosmopolitan′

newsNm: [Video] BTS′ ′Blood Sweat & Tears′ Hits Over 100 Million Views
newsDesc:
BTS′ Blood Sweat & Tears music video has exceeded 100 million views.


As of February 20, the music video for BTS′ title track Blood Sweat & Tears of their 2nd studio album Wings hit over 100 million views. They were able to reach this milestone within 4 months of releasing the music video.
Accordingly, BTS has surpassed 100 million views for 3 music videos including Dope, Fire and Blood Sweat & Tears.


BTS′ Blood Sweat & Tears is a moombahton trap track with reggae beats and shows off BTS′ powerful energy.


Additionally, at the time of it′s release, the music video for Blood Sweat & Tears was listed on Billboard′s Most Viewed K-Pop Videos in America, Around the World: October 2016.


Meanwhile, BTS successfully held their 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR at the Gocheok Sky Dome on February 18-19 and met with 40,000 fans.





Photo credit: BTS ′Blood Sweat & Tears′ MV screen capture
showTitle: [Video] BTS′ ′Blood Sweat & Tears′ Hits Over 100 Million Views

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon Reveals Cute Baby Photo
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon has shared a cute baby photo.


On February 20, Taeyeon attracted the attention of fans after sharing a baby photo through through her personal Instagram. Along with sharing the photo, Taeyeon also wrote, "February 28. I will fatten up your ears. Listen to Kim Taegoo′s album with your plump ears and experience an exciting spring. Baby Taegoo. It′s really me."


Meanwhile, Taeyeon is releasing her 1st solo studio album My Voice and title track Fine on February 28. The upcoming album will show Taeyeon′s musical range as it will consist of a variety of genres including pop ballad, pop R&B, alternative R&B and more.


Photo credit: Taeyeon Instagram
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon Reveals Cute Baby Photo

newsNm: Big Bang′s ′MADE′ Tops Weekly Oricon Chart
newsDesc:
Male idol group Big Bang′s album MADE has reached number 1 on Japan′s Oricon Weekly chart.


Big Bang′s album MADE, which was released on February 15 in Japan, previously reached number 1 on Oricon′s Daily CD Album Ranking chart and has now also reached number 1 on their Weekly CD Album Ranking chart. Big Bang′s new album showed huge success in Japan by selling over 100,000 copies within it′s first week of release. The album marks Big Bang′s third album to sell over 100,000 copies in it′s first week following their albums The Best of Big Bang 2006-2014 and Made Series.


MADE marks Big Bang′s last release before member T.O.P officially enlisted in the Korean military earlier this month. The album consists of 14 tracks including FXXT IT, Last Dance, Girlfriend and Japanese version of tracks Bang Bang Bang, Loser and If You of the album Made Series.


Meanwhile, Big Bang toured a total of 6 cities with 24 concerts to mark their 10th anniversary. Member Daesung is set to release new mini album D-Day and will also be holding a Japan Dome Tour in April.


Photo credit: YG Entertainment
showTitle: Big Bang′s ′MADE′ Tops Weekly Oricon Chart

newsNm: Gugudan Reveals Track List for ′Act.2 Narcissus′
newsDesc:
Girl group Gugudan has released the track list for Act.2 Narcissus one week ahead of it′s release.


On February 21, Gugudan released the track list for their upcoming 2nd mini album Act.2 Narcissus through their official SNS channels. According to the track list, the album will consist of 6 tracks including title track A Girl Like Me. Title track A Girl Like Me was produced by Cho Wool, who has worked with artists Twice and GOT7 in the past.


Additionally, top producers who have worked with Gugudan for their debut album Act.1 The Little Mermaid have once again joined hands with the group. Jin Lee, who previously worked on Dairy; MELODESIGN, who worked on Maybe Tomorrow; and Erik Lidbom are just some names credited on the track list.


Meanwhile, Gugudan is making a comeback with Act.2 Narcissus on February 28.


Photo credit: Jellyfish Entertainment
showTitle: Gugudan Reveals Track List for ′Act.2 Narcissus′

newsDesc:
Mnet大型選秀節目《Produce 101》去年選拔出女團I.O.I，預計於今年上半年播出第二季，第二季的參賽者以Fantagio、Pledis、Cube、JELLYFISH、Brandnewmusic、RBW等經紀公司的男練習生?主，在企劃初期就備受期待。

newsNm: B.A.P′s Dae Hyun and Jong Up Pose for ′Rose′ Teaser Images
newsDesc:
B.A.P′s Dae Hyun and Jong Up have posed for Rose teaser images.


On February 21, B.A.P′s agency TS Entertainment released teaser images featuring members Dae Hyun and Jong Up for their upcoming 6th single album Rose. According to B.A.P′s agency TS Entertainment, the upcoming album will continue the color series that began with B.A.P′s 2nd studio album Noir, which was released in November 2016. While Noir signified the color black, Rose will focus on red.


Meanwhile, B.A.P, who will be making a comeback with a new album in March, will begin their World Tour with the concert B.A.P 2017 WORLD TOUR ‘PARTY BABY!’ - SEOUL BOOM, which will be held at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall on March 24-26.


Photo credit: TS Entertainment
showTitle: B.A.P′s Dae Hyun and Jong Up Pose for ′Rose′ Teaser Images

newsNm: BTOB Confirms Comeback in March
newsDesc:
Idol group BTOB has confirmed to make a comeback on March 6.


On February 21, BTOB revealed the artwork for their 10th mini album Feel′eM through their official SNS channels. Additionally, they are confirmed to be making a comeback on March 6.
In the revealed artwork, the album title and comeback date are written on a vintage production slate.


BTOB most recently promoted dance title track Pray (I′ll Be Your Man) of their album New Men in November 2016. Additionally, in January, the boy group also sold out of tickets for their 3rd solo concert within 2 minutes.


Meanwhile, BTOB plan to create special memories with fans at their 3rd official fan meeting BTOB′s Secret Room, which will be held on March 5.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: BTOB Confirms Comeback in March

newsNm: B.I.G to Appear on First Reality Program
newsDesc:
Male group B.I.G is set to appear in their first reality program.


B.I.G released a short video through their official Instagram teasing fans of their upcoming reality program. According to the teaser video, B.I.G′s first reality program B.I.G Project will begin airing on February 27 through MBC Music. In the revealed teaser video, B.I.G is seen spending time in Jeju Island. They raise expectations for their upcoming reality program by showing glimpses of each member.


Additionally, the teaser is especially gaining attention as member Kook Min Pyo, who is taking a break from 1,2,3 promotions due to his health, makes an appearance.


B.I.G′s first reality program B.I.G Project will beging airing on February 27 and run for 4 episodes.


Meanwhile, B.I.G released their 5th single album 1,2,3 and have been actively promoting through music programs and connecting with fans through surprise fan meetings.


Photo credit: MBC Music
showTitle: B.I.G to Appear on First Reality Program

newsDesc:
大勢女團TWICE將於23日下午6點(韓國時間)直播的Mnet《M Countdown》首跳新歌《KNOCK KNOCK》!

TWICE是賣萌達人，《CHEER UP》創造出流行語‘蝦蝦蝦’，《TT》的‘哭哭舞’簡單好學又可愛，連SBS《被告人》的演員都在跳，影響力不同凡響，因此?們這次的 ′敲門舞′備受各界期待。

此外，收錄在改版專輯《TWICEcoaster: LANE 2》的《KNOCK KNOCK》，發行首日就衝上Melon、Mnet、Olleh Music、Genie、Bugs、Naver Music、Soribada和Monkey3八音源網站排行榜第一名，MV在YouTube上架1天半就突破1368萬人次點閱，氣勢非凡。

During the live MEET&GREET, Gugudan will choose 7 out of 49 tiles to receive Gugudan photo cards, exclusively available at Mwave.

Gugudan is stopping by Mwave sometime in March, so keep an eye out for the exact date and tune into the live MEET&GREET, only on Mwave!

newsNm: Ailee Revealed to be Preparing for March Comeback
newsDesc:
Singer Ailee is revealed to be preparing for a March comeback.


On February 21, Ailee′s agency YMC Entertainment shared, "Ailee is preparing a single with a goal to make a comeback in early March. She completed her music video shoot yesterday." They continued, "Ailee has personally acted in her music video as the main character. It has not yet been decided whether she will do music program promotions."


Earlier this year, Ailee achieved a perfect all-kill with track I Will Go To You Like The First Snow, which was the OST to tvN drama Guardian: The Lonely and Great God.


Photo credit: Ailee Instagram
showTitle: Ailee Revealed to be Preparing for March Comeback

newsNm: Shinhwa′s Kim Dong Wan Sustains Leg Injury
newsDesc:
Male group Shinhwa′s Kim Dong Wan has sustained a leg injury.


On February 21, Kim Dong Wan′s agency Shinhwa Company revealed that the singer injured a ligament in his knee after slipping in the rain and is currently receiving treatment. Kim Dong Wan is currently in a leg cast and will not be able to dance on stage during Shinhwa′s upcoming concert 2017 Shinhwa Live Unchanging Tour, which is set to take place on February 25 at Daegu′s EXCO.


However, the agency expressed that Kim Dong Wan plans to try his best as this is Shinhwa′s first concert in Daegu in 14 years.


Photo credit: Shinhwa Company
showTitle: Shinhwa′s Kim Dong Wan Sustains Leg Injury

newsNm: Oh My Girl Confirmed to Make Spring Comeback
newsDesc:
Girl group Oh My Girl is preparing for a comeback.


Oh My Girl′s agency revealed, "They are preparing for a comeback, but the release date has not been decided. They plan to make a comeback in the spring." When asked about member JinE, who is currently taking a break from activities due to her anorexia, the agency shared, "We will decide after fully discussing with JinE and her parents."


Meanwhile, after releasing a remake of Papaya′s Listen to My Word (A-ing) in August 2016, Oh My Girl members have been actively appearing in variety programs.


Photo credit: WM Entertainment
showTitle: Oh My Girl Confirmed to Make Spring Comeback

newsNm: miss A′s Suzy and Park Won Pose for ′Don′t Wait For Your Love′ Cover
newsDesc:
miss A′s Suzy and Park Won have posed for the cover of their collaboration track Don′t Wait For Your Love.


On February 21, the teaser image, which was released through Park Won′s official SNS channel, shows Park Won and Suzy gazing into each others′ eyes while sitting next to each other in a vintage cafe. Park Won is seen playing his guitar and Suzy is wearing a long red skirt. Additionally, Park Won also shared a short video clip teasing fans of his collaboration track with Suzy with the message, "I think I′ll sing a song with someone I couldn′t have imagined. Aren′t you curious to know what kind of song it is?"


Suzy has been recently gaining recognition as a solo artist. Her duet with EXO′s Baek Hyun Dream, which was released in January 2016, won the Best Collaboration Award at the 2016 Mnet Asian Music Awards and also the Digital Bonsang Award at the 31st Golden Disc Awards.


Park Won debuted through the group One More Chance in 2010. The group found success with track I Think About You and Park Won also gained attention as a solo artist with his 2015 solo album Like A Wonder.


Meanwhile, Park Won and Suzy′s collaboration single Don′t Wait For Your Love will be released on February 28.


Photo credit: MakeUs Entertainment
showTitle: miss A′s Suzy and Park Won Pose for ′Don′t Wait For Your Love′ Cover

newsNm: [Video] Gugudan Releases Highlight Medley Video for ′Act.2 Narcissus′
newsDesc:
Female group Gugudan has released the highlight medley video for their upcoming album Act.2 Narcissus.


On February 22, Gugudan teased fans by sharing the highlight medley video of their 2nd mini album Act.2 Narcissus through their official SNS channels.Through the highlight medley, Gugudan revealed a glimpse of title track A Girl Like Me as well as the 4 remaining tracks included in the album. Fans are already showing their interest in the upcoming album as it reveals a variety of genres and will show off Gugudan′s musical transformation.


A Girl Like Me is a bubblegum pop genre track with an energetic beat. It talks about a girl who has fallen in love and confidently confesses with her cute charm. The melody, which was released for the first time through the highlight medley, is already capturing the attention of many fans.


Meanwhile, Gugudan, who has been teasing fans through official comeback images, has also raised the expectations of their comeback through their newly released highlight medley video. The girl group will officially return with Act.2 Narcissus on February 28 and actively promote title track A Girl Like Me.





Photo credit: Jellyfish Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Gugudan Releases Highlight Medley Video for ′Act.2 Narcissus′

newsNm: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ Reaches Top 10 on Music Charts Around the World
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice′s popularity has gone beyond Korea and reaching countries around the world.


On February 22, it was revealed through Twice′s agency JYP Entertainment and iTunes that Twice′s new album TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 reached number 1 on the Albums Chart in Singapore, Taiwan and Malaysia. Additionally, title track Knock Knock has made it onto the Top 10 on the iTunes′ Songs Chart in 9 countries including Sweden, Hong Kong, Singapore and Thailand.


Twice showed even more success on iTunes′ K-Pop Albums Chart. In addition to being ranked number 1 on America′s K-Pop Albums Chart and number 2 on the K-Pop Songs Chart, the album and title track topped the Albums Chart in 7 countries and Songs Chart in 8 countries.


Meanwhile, as soon as Twice released title track Knock Knock, the track topped music charts throughout Korea.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ Reaches Top 10 on Music Charts Around the World

newsNm: BEAST商標權受爭議 尹斗俊這樣回應...
newsDesc:
原BEAST成員尹斗俊（27歲）與龍俊亨、梁耀燮、李起光、孫東雲去年10月離開老東家Cube娛樂後，自組公司Around US娛樂，但因前公司擁有隊名‘BEAST’的商標權，加上前公司宣佈將推出以張賢勝?首的‘全新BEAST’，照這情勢看來，出走的5名成員恐?無法繼續使用BEAST的團名。

在這敏感之際，尹斗俊昨天(21日)出席tvN料理節目《家常飯白老師3》，難免會被問到與BEAST商標權相關的問題，但他不願多說，僅回答:“沒有什?可以說的，我也不?楚，在這個場合也不方便說。”

他憑tvN《一起吃飯?》和《一起吃飯?2》成?‘國民吃貨’，這次加入《家常飯白老師3》展現廚男的一面，他表示:“我簽進新公司沒多久，謝謝製作單位?我上節目。我?喜歡吃東西，所以上了?多美食節目，同時也能增加團體的曝光率。”、“我想讓大家看到我吃得津津有味及享受的樣子。” 照片來源:許正珉
showTitle: BEAST商標權受爭議 尹斗俊這樣回應...

newsNm: Block B′s Zico to Release New Track With Yoon Jong Shin
newsDesc:
Block B′s Zico will be releasing a new track with artist Yoon Jong Shin.


Zico will be participating in Yoon Jong Shin′s project Monthly Yoon Jong Shin through the new track Wi-Fi. A representative of Yoon Jong Shin stated regarding the new track, "New track ′Wi-Fi′ will be different from Yoon Jong Shin′s past songs about breaking up. If his previous songs talked about memories with a past love, this song will be closer to the opposite."


Yoon Jong Shin, who has been releasing monthly tracks since 2016, has previously partnered with Epik High′s Tablo, Seventeen′s vocal unit and VIXX′s Ken.


Meanwhile, Wi-Fi was composed and arrange by 015B′s Jung Suk Won and written by Zico and Yoon Jong Shin. The track will officially release on February 24.


Photo credit: Mystic89
showTitle: Block B′s Zico to Release New Track With Yoon Jong Shin

newsNm: 【專訪】Wonder Girls解散情不散 安昭熙見歐膩哽咽
newsDesc:
成軍10年的女團Wonder Girls於上個月正式解散，前年7月退團的安昭熙宣傳新片《單身騎士》，受訪難逃被問與Wonder Girls相關的問題，?今天(22日)表示:“我?成員們經常聯絡，?謝謝?們參加《單身騎士》的VIP試映會，我?想讓?們看這部片。我在試映會的休息室與歐?們聊天，說著說著難過到一度?咽。”

被問及會不會感到遺憾時，?回答:“我們常常聯絡，所以我提前知道?們要解散的消息。好像有了回顧過去的時間，不過未來才是最重要的。希望我和成員們以後都能發展的更好。”

新片《單身騎士》由李炳憲、孔曉振和安昭熙領銜主演，故事講述令韓國人民震驚的案件，一名男子消失之後展開一連串的神秘事件，今天在韓國上映。 照片來源:許正珉

newsNm: B.A.P′s Young Jae and Zelo Are Mysterious in New Teaser Images
newsDesc:
B.A.P′s Young Jae and Zelo are mysterious in new teaser images.


On February 22, B.A.P′s agency TS Entertainment released teaser images featuring members Young Jae and Zelo. In the revealed images, Zelo has his hair colored pink to match his shirt while Young Jae is seen wearing a red shirt until a white top.


According to B.A.P′s agency TS Entertainment, the upcoming album will continue the color series that began with B.A.P′s 2nd studio album Noir, which was released in November 2016. While Noir signified the color black, Rose will focus on red.


Meanwhile, B.A.P, who will be making a comeback with a new album in March, will begin their World Tour with the concert B.A.P 2017 WORLD TOUR ‘PARTY BABY!’ - SEOUL BOOM, which will be held at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall on March 24-26.


Photo credit: TS Entertainment
showTitle: B.A.P′s Young Jae and Zelo Are Mysterious in New Teaser Images

newsNm: Former 2NE1 Member Minzy to Collaborate With Jay Park
newsDesc:
Former 2NE1 member Minzy is preparing a collaboration with Jay Park.On February 22, Minzy′s agency Herald Pop revealed, "Minzy recently completed recording with Jay Park. The release date for both the title track and solo album are not set yet. We have been consistently recording since last year."

newsNm: BTS Reaches Number 15 on Billboard′s ′Bubbling Under Hot 100′
newsDesc:
Group BTS has reached number 15 on Billboard′s Bubbling Under Hot 100.


On February 21, Billboard published an article titled, "BTS Crack the Bubbling Under Hot 100 With ′Spring Day,′ Conquer Multiple Charts With ′You Never Walk Alone.′" Billboard revealed, "Most notably, the K-pop boy band′s new single ′Spring Day′ debuts at No. 15 on Billboard′s Bubbling Under Hot 100 chart for the chart dated March 4, 2017. The Bubbling Under Hot 100 acts as an extension of the 25 songs that have yet to chart on the definitive Hot 100 singles chart and are just below the top 100 slots."


Billboard′s Bubbling Under Hot 100 lists top singles that have not yet charted on the main Billboard Hot 100 and currently lists 25 positions.


Billboard continued by sharing, "BTS′ ′Spring Day′ is almost all in Korean, had zero promotions in America, was released new music during a notoriously competitive week with the 2017 Grammy Awards, and "Spring Day" dropped on a Sunday making their charting window smaller than other releases."


Meanwhile, BTS successfully held their 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR at the Gocheok Sky Dome on February 18-19 and met with 40,000 fans.


Photo credit: Billboard screen capture
showTitle: BTS Reaches Number 15 on Billboard′s ′Bubbling Under Hot 100′

newsNm: JYJ′s Kim Jae Joong to Continue Japan Tour in Nagoya
newsDesc:
Male group JYJ′s Kim Jae Joong will continue his Japan Tour in Nagoya.


On February 22, Kim Jae Joong′s agency C-JeS Entertainment revealed that that the singer will meet fans in Nagoya on February 22 and 23 with his concert 2017 KIM JAEJOONG ASIA TOUR in JAPAN ′The REBIRTH of J′. Kim Jae Joong began his Japan Tour in Yokohama in early February and has already met 56,000 fans while traveling tour Japan.


Kim Jae Joong′s agency shared, "On February 20, the Nagoya airport was full of fans greeting Kim Jae Joong, who hasn′t been to Nagoya in a while. Kim Jae Joong once again proved his popularity by being welcomed by excited fans upon his arrival."


Meanwhile, following his concert in Nagoya, Kim Jae Joong will perform a encore concert in Saitama this weekend.


Photo credit: C-JeS Entertainment
showTitle: JYJ′s Kim Jae Joong to Continue Japan Tour in Nagoya

newsNm: BTS Named on ′Billboard 200′ For a Fourth Time
newsDesc:
BTS has become the first Korean artist to reach Billboard′s main chart Billboard 200 with four albums in a row.


According to the Billboard 200 chart published on February 22, BTS′ new album Wings: You Never Walk Alon is listed as number 61. Accordingly, BTS′ last 4 albums reached the Billboard 200 chart with The Most Beautiful Moment in Life, Part 2 reaching number 171 in December 2015, The Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Young Forever reaching number 107 in May 2016 and Wings reaching number 26 in October 2016.


Additionally, BTS′ new album also reached number 15 on the Bubbling Under Hot 100 chart, number 1 on Social 50, number 1 on World Albums, number 35 on Canada Albums and number 21 on Artists 100.


On the World Digital Songs chart, BTS ranked number 1 through 4 with Spring Day, Not Today, A Supplementary Story: You New Walk Alone and Outro: Wings.


Meanwhile, BTS will begin music program promotions with their first appearance on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on February 23.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS Named on ′Billboard 200′ For a Fourth Time

newsNm: SNSD to Release New Album to Commemorate 10th Anniversary
newsDesc:
Girl group SNSD is preparing a new album to be released in the summer to commemorate their 10th anniversary.


On February 22, according to a representative, SNSD is planning to release a new album by the end of July. They have recently began preparations on the album.The upcoming album will mark SNSD′s first release in 2 years since releasing Lion Heart in 2015. Previously, member Sooyoung shared while appearing on a program, "This year is SNSD′s 10th anniversary since debuting. We want to receive another daesang to commemorate our 10th anniversary."


SNSD debuted in 2007 with Into The New World made a huge hit with the release of Gee in 2009. Since then, each release at topped charts, including their most recent album Lion Heart.


Meanwhile, leading up to their 10th anniversary, members Seohyun and Taeyeon have each released solo albums in 2017. The members have each been active in their respective activities with Yoona also appearing in her first Korean movie Confidential Assignment and Yuri appearing in drama Defendant.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD to Release New Album to Commemorate 10th Anniversary

newsNm: BoA to MC Second Season of ′Produce 101′
newsDesc:
Artist and actress BoA will be taking Jang Keun Suk′s place as the MC of Produce 101′s next season.


On February 23, Mnet revealed, "BoA, who has been an artist for 18 years, is confirmed to MC ′Produce 101 Season 2,′ which will air in the first half of this year." Produce 101 Season 2 will be a project that gathers 101 male trainees from a variety of Korean agencies to form a project group. The audience will become the producers of the group and help select the concept, debut track and group name.


As the MC of Produce 101 Season 2 BoA will represent the audience in delivering results to the trainees during the program.


Through the production team, BoA stated, "I am happy to be joining ′Produce 101 Season 2,′ which is gaining a lot of interest. Please look forward to the 101 boys dreaming to become a singer."


Meanwhile, Mnet′s upcoming male boy group project Produce 101 Season 2 will air in the first half of the year.


Photo credit: BoA Instagram
showTitle: BoA to MC Second Season of ′Produce 101′

newsNm: Double S 301′s Kim Hyung Jun′s 3rd Mini Album to Open Preorders
newsDesc:
Boy group Double S 301′s Kim Hyung Jun will open preorders for his 3rd mini album.


Kim Hyung Jun, whose 3rd mini album AM to PM 5-11-3 releases in March, will open preorders for that album on February 23 through a variety of music sites.

The upcoming album marks Kim Hyung Jun′s first release in 5 years and will talk about the actions and feelings of a man who have fallen in love. The album will be released in both a Korean and Japanese version.


AM to PM 5-11-3 will consist of 4 tracks including title track Count on You and tracks 2Moro and Woo Yeah.


Fans are especially looking forward to the album as Kim Hyung Jun has personally participated in the writing and composing of the title track Count on You and the remaining tracks as well.


Meanwhile, Kim Hyung Jun will release his 3rd mini album AM to PM 5-11-3 in March and plans to begin his mandatory military service in April.


Photo credit: CI Entertainment
showTitle: Double S 301′s Kim Hyung Jun′s 3rd Mini Album to Open Preorders

newsNm: BTS Celebrates College Graduation of Member Jin
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTS has celebrated the college graduation of member Jin.


On February 22, Jin shared a photo through BTS′ official Twitter with the message, "I am so happy to experience everything together. Thank you A.R.M.Y." In the revealed photo, Jin is wearing his graduation cap and gown while holding a large bouquet of flowers. Jin was attending Konkuk University as a first year student at the time his was selected to debut with BTS.


Meanwhile, Jin′s group BTS has recently released their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone and has been showing huge success with title track Spring Day. They will begin music program promotions with their first appearance on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on February 23.


Photo credit: BTS Twitter screen capture
showTitle: BTS Celebrates College Graduation of Member Jin

newsNm: Shinhwa′s Eric Revealed to be Dating Actress Na Hae Mi
newsDesc:
Shinhwa′s Eric is revealed to be dating model and actress Nam Hae Mi.


On February 23, a representative of Eric revealed, "Eric and Nam Hae Mi were close sunbae and hoobae and it has led into dating." Additionally, Nam Hae Mi′s agency Imagine Asia also shared, "We were unable to confirm with Nam Hae Mi as she is busy with a schedule. We will release an official statement after personally confirming with her."


Previously, dating rumors between the pair surfaced in 2014, but both agencies denied the rumors at the time. Eric was then also in the center of dating rumors between Another Oh Hae Young co-star Seo Hyun Jin in 2016.


Meanwhile, Nam Hae Mi is 12 years younger than Eric.


Photo credit: Shinhwa Company, Imagine Asia
showTitle: Shinhwa′s Eric Revealed to be Dating Actress Na Hae Mi

newsNm: GFriend Prepares to Release New Album in March
newsDesc:
Girl group GFriend is preparing a new album to be released in March.


On February 23, GFriend′s agency Source Music shared revealed that the girl group will be releasing a new mini album on March 6. The upcoming album will be there first release in 8 months since releasing their 1st studio album LOL in August. In 2016, GFriend released two albums and promoted hit tracks Rough and Navillera. They received 15 music program wins with Rough while Navillera won 14 music program trophies. Additionally, both tracks were streamed over 100 million times and showed huge success.


The agency shared, "In the new album, they have made a transformation from their previous images." They also asked fans to look forward to what GFriend has prepared for them.


Meanwhile, fans can look forward to GFriend′s upcoming album, which will be released in March.


Photo credit: Source Music
showTitle: GFriend Prepares to Release New Album in March

newsDesc:
Boy group Monsta X is confirmed to be making a comeback in March.


On February 23, Monsta X′s agency Starship Entertainment revealed, "While Monsta X was initially set to make a comeback at the end of February, their comeback has been confirmed for the end of March due to album preparations and schedules abroad. They are currently making final preparations." According to a representative, Monsta X has been preparing the new album since January.


Fans are especially excited to see the group come together as they have been busy with individual activities and promotions abroad. Additionally, the upcoming release comes only 5 months since the release of The Clan Pt.2 Guilty, which was released in October 2016.


Photo credit: Starship Entertainment
showTitle: Monsta X Confirmed to be Making Comeback

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon to Perform First Stage Through ′Music Bank′
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon, who is releasing her 1st solo studio album, is performing her first stage through Music Bank.


On March 3, Taeyeon will be performing her new title track Fine for the first time on stage during KBS 2TV′s Music Bank. Taeyeon has been raising expectations for her upcoming album by releasing a variety of content through SMTOWN′s official YouTube and Naver TV channels. Starting on February 21, she attracted the attention of fans by releasing a highlight clip each day for 5 days.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon will officially release her 1st solo studio album My Voice and title track Fine through a variety of music sites on February 28.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon to Perform First Stage Through ′Music Bank′

newsNm: [Video] Lovelyz Transform into Paper Dolls For Teaser Video
newsDesc:
Girl group Lovelyz has transformed into cute paper dolls.


On February 23, Lovelyz released the second teaser video for their upcoming 2nd studio album R U Ready? through their official YouTube and Naver V app channels.The 20 seconds long video raises curiosity and expectations for the new album′s concept. Similar to the previously released teaser video, Lovelyz members have transformed into dolls inside of a laptop.


Meanwhile, Lovelyz′s 2nd studio album R U Ready? is set to release through a variety of music sites on February 26. Additionally, the girl group plans to hold their comeback showcase on February 27 at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall.





Photo credit: Woollim Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Lovelyz Transform into Paper Dolls For Teaser Video

newsNm: [Video] Twice Performs First ′Knock Knock′ Comeback Stage on ′M COUNTDOWN′
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice has performed their first comeback stage with new track Knock Knock on M COUNTDOWN.


On February 23, Twice appeared on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN and captured the hearts of fans with their first comeback performance with title track Knock Knock of their new album TWICEcoaster: Lane2. During Twice′s performance, the stage was decorated with bright colors to match the energetic track Knock Knock. Twice′s fan club ONCE showed their support for the group′s new track by cheering during their comeback stage.


Meanwhile, Gavy NJ, Red Velvet, MASK, Melody Day, BST, 100%, VAV, B.I.G, BEATWIN, BIGFLO, SONAMOO, CLC, SF9, NCT DREAM, NCT 127, WJSN, Top Secret and Cross Gene also performed during the February 23 episode of Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN.





Photo credit: Mnet ′M COUNTDOWN′ screen capture
showTitle: [Video] Twice Performs First ′Knock Knock′ Comeback Stage on ′M COUNTDOWN′

newsNm: [Video] BTS Performs Comeback Stage and Takes Home Trophy on ′M COUNTDOWN′
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTS has both performed their comeback stage and taken home the trophy on M COUNTDOWN.


On February 23, BTS′s title track Spring Day was a contender for 1st place on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN against Red Velvet′s Rookie. In the end, BTS took home the trophy with their new track and thanked their fan club A.R.M.Y multiple times while accepting the win. BTS′ comeback stage consisted of performances of new track title track Spring Day and track Not Today of their new album Wings: You Never Walk Alone. Spring Day is a song about not losing hope while waiting for a friend that has grown apart and Not Today is a powerful and energetic track.


Additionally, the episode was especially special as girl group Twice also performed their first comeback stage with new track Knock Knock.


Meanwhile, Gavy NJ, Red Velvet, MASK, Melody Day, 100%, VAV, B.I.G, BEATWIN, BIGFLO, SONAMOO, CLC, SF9, NCT DREAM, NCT 127, WJSN, Top Secret and Cross Gene also performed during the February 23 episode of Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN.





Photo credit: Mnet ′M COUNTDOWN′ screen capture
showTitle: [Video] BTS Performs Comeback Stage and Takes Home Trophy on ′M COUNTDOWN′

newsNm: BEAST Attracts the Attention of Fans with a Group Selfie
newsDesc:
Male group BEAST has attracted the attention of fans after sharing a new group selfie.


On February 23, member Yoon Du Jun shared a photo through his personal Instagram with the message, "Group shot, it′s been a while."
In the revealed image, the members of BEAST are seen with their hair and makeup done for a schedule. Fans were quick to notice and showed their curiosity as to where BEAST was headed.


Meanwhile, BEAST left Cube Entertainment last year and established their own agency Around US Entertainment. While they are preparing a new album under the new label, a comeback date has not been set. The group is still in discussions with Cube Entertainment in regards to the usage of the group name BEAST.


Photo credit: Yoon Du Jun Instagram
showTitle: BEAST Attracts the Attention of Fans with a Group Selfie

newsNm: f(x)′s Krystal Featured on Exclusive Outtake Photos Revealed Through Billboard
newsDesc:
Girl group f(x)′s Krystal has been featured on exclusive outtake photos from her collaboration with band Glen Check′s Kim June One.


On February 22, Billboard revealed the exclusive outtake photos from Krystal and Kim June One′s collaboration I Don′t Wanna Love You through an article titled, "f(x)′s Krystal & Glen Check′s June One Kim Collaborate on Stunning ′I Don′t Wanna Love You′: Exclusive Outtake Photos."
Through the article, Billboard shared, "The song brings together the girl-group member and electro-rock band′s singer-guitarist for a dreamy electro-pop cut with a foreboding vibe."


Additionally, the collaboration track was introduced around the world through Apple Music Beats 1 program Chart #1.


I Don′t Wanna Love You isn′t simply a musical track, but also an artistic visual that was represented through the artistic music video and photo spread.


Meanwhile, Kim June One personally wrote, composed and produced I Don′t Wanna Love You while SM Entertainment′s visual director Kim Hee Jin took charge of the various visuals including the music video, photography and artwork.


Photo credit: Billboard screen capture
showTitle: f(x)′s Krystal Featured on Exclusive Outtake Photos Revealed Through Billboard

newsNm: SHINee Begins Promotions for 5th Studio Album in Japan
newsDesc:
Male group SHINee has begun promotions for their 5th studio album in Japan.


SHINee′s 5th Japanese studio album FIVE was released on February 22 and reached number 2 on Oricon′s daily chart on the day of it′s release.
SHINee is currently promoting the new album throughout Japan. A truck covered in photos of SHINee is driving around 4 cities in Japan including Tokyo, Osaka, Nagoya and Fukuoka and 5 Tokyo subway stations are also covered in images of SHINee. Additionally, buildings, billboards and screens near Shibuya station are also decorated with SHINee.


SHINee began their SHINee WORLD 2017～FIVE～ tour in Fukui on January 28-29 and the group plans to tour a total of 10 cities with 25 concerts. Their plan is to meet with 250,000 fans by the end of their Japan tour.


Meanwhile, SHINee will also hold their first North American tour in March. They will be visiting Toronto, Vancouver, Dallas and Los Angeles with SHINee CONCERT ‘SHINee WORLD V.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SHINee Begins Promotions for 5th Studio Album in Japan

newsNm: Twice to Officially Begin Promotions in Japan
newsDesc:
Twice is officially beginning their Japan promotions in June.


On February 24, Twice announced plans to officially begin promotions in Japan through their Japan website. On the same day, a popular Japanese morning program also announced Twice′s debut plans.

Twice plans to release their debut Japan album #TWICE on June 28 and actively promote in Japan. The album will include a total of 10 tracks including the Korean and Japanese versions of Twice′s hit tracks Like Ooh-Ahh, Cheer Up and TT.


Twice′s official Japanese Twitter, which opened on February 8, gained 60,000 followers within the first day and their mini album TWICEcoaster: Lane 1, which was released on October 2016, was listed number 1 on Oricon′s International Albums chart for the month of November.


Meanwhile, fans are looking forward to Twice′s official promotions in Japan.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice to Officially Begin Promotions in Japan

每個女孩心中都有一個巴黎夢，具荷拉也不例外，最想吃的是知名?點馬?龍，?說:“吃當地有名的?食，也是體驗文化的一種方式。想要感受巴黎的?。”

17歲出道的?，不知不覺間也跨越到20後半段，?表示:“不覺得年紀對自己有什?影響，只是?難想像這?快就26歲。雖然還算年輕，但隨著年齡的增長，應該要更有責任感。”

雖然是偶像歌手出身，?至今也出演了不少電視劇，最令人印象深刻的無疑是SBS《城市獵人》。簽進以裴勇浚?首的Keyeast娛樂後，將全力朝演?發展，?表示一半期待、一半擔憂，心情也?激動。 20170223/11279704.jpg照片來源:《Cosmopolitan》

newsNm: SNSD′s Seohyun to Hold First Solo Concert
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Seohyun is holding her first solo concert.


Beginning February 24 through February 26, Seohyun will be holding her first solo concert Love, Stil - Seohyun at the SMTOWN Theatre located in the Coex Artium.

During the concert, Seohyun plans to perform tracks from her first solo album Don′t Say No as well as songs by SNSD and Girls′ Generation-TTS. Additionally, she will also be performing with a live band with the stage matching the theme of Love.


Through Seohyun′s 1st mini album Don′t Say No the artist showed her skills as a lyricist and revealed her musical range. Title track Don′t Say No revealed to be successful with the track topping multiple music charts in Korea and receiving music program trophies.


Meanwhile, Seohyun, who successfully completed promotions with her first solo album, has been actively appearing in variety programs including JTBC′s Knowing Bros, MBC′s King of Mask Singer and Secretly Greatly.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD′s Seohyun to Hold First Solo Concert

newsNm: ZE:A′s Kwang Hee Confirms Date of Military Enlistment
newsDesc:
ZE:A′s Kwang Hee has confirmed the date of his military enlistment.


On February 24, Kwang Hee′s agency Bonboo Entertainment revealed that the singer will begin his mandatory military service on March 13. Kwang Hee plans to continue his previously scheduled appearances up until the day of his enlistment. Kwang Hee, who last filmed MBC′s Infinite Challenge on February 23, will discuss his final filming for the show with the production team. He has revealed that he will attend as many Infinite Challenge filming dates as time will allow.


Additionally, Kwang Hee also has a planned appearance on Radio Star in early March. Besides these two programs, Kwang Hee has not yet scheduled any other appearances.


Meanwhile, Kwang Hee gained attention after signing with Bonboo Entertainment leading up to his enlistment. At the time, a representative shared, "We will help Kwang Hee make final preparations before enlisting in the military and once he is discharged, we will plan his promotion plans."


Photo credit: Kwang Hee Instagram
showTitle: ZE:A′s Kwang Hee Confirms Date of Military Enlistment

newsNm: [Video] miss A′s Suzy and Park Won Reveal Smooth Vocals in Teaser Video
newsDesc:
miss A′s Suzy and Park Won have revealed their smooth vocals through a teaser video.


On February 24, Park Won and Suzy shared the second teaser video to their upcoming single Don′t Wait For Your Love, which is releasing on February 28. In the revealed teaser video, Suzy and Park Won are sitting in a cafe while facing each other. The sun is shining brightly into the room, giving it a dreamy aura.


The teaser video reveals a longer preview of the upcoming single compared to the first video and raises expectations for Don′t Wait For Your Love′s official release.


Not only has Suzy been active in her group miss A and as an actress, the singer has been recently gaining recognition as a solo artist. Her duet with EXO′s Baek Hyun Dream, which was released in January 2016, won the Best Collaboration Award at the 2016 Mnet Asian Music Awards and also the Digital Bonsang Award at the 31st Golden Disc Awards.


Park Won debuted through the group One More Chance in 2010. The group found success with track I Think About You and Park Won also gained attention as a solo artist with his 2015 solo album Like A Wonder.


Meanwhile, Park Won and Suzy′s collaboration single Don′t Wait For Your Love will be released on February 28.





Photo credit: MakeUs Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] miss A′s Suzy and Park Won Reveal Smooth Vocals in Teaser Video

newsNm: Hyuna Shows Off Various Makeup Looks in ′Vogue Korea′
newsDesc:
Hyuna has shown off her various makeup looks in Vogue Korea.


Recently, Hyuna was featured on a photo spread in fashion magazine Vogue Korea and showed off a variety of lip colors including red, pink and orange.In the revealed photo spread, Hyuna poses in a variety of scenes and looks to match the various lip colors she showcases. She reminds fans of a doll with her blank gaze, long and voluminous lashes and bright colored lips.


Meanwhile, Hyuna recently celebrated her 10th anniversary through a special fan meeting and the singer will be touring 8 cities in North America beginning in Vancouver on February 22.


Photo credit: Vogue Korea

newsNm: Sulli and SNSD′s Yoona Pose Together While Attending Event
newsDesc:
Girl group SNSD′s Yoona and Sulli have posed together while attending an event.


On February 24, Sulli gained the attention of fans after posting a photo of herself and Yoona through her personal Instagram page. In the revealed image, Sully has her arm linked through Yoona′s arm while both star smile into the camera. The pair are especially gaining attention as they are both under the same agency SM Entertainment.


Meanwhile, Sulli is awaiting the release of her new film Real and Yoona has also received praise for her role in the film Confidential Assignment, which was released in January.


Photo credit: Sulli Instagram
showTitle: Sulli and SNSD′s Yoona Pose Together While Attending Event

newsNm: SNSD′s Hyoyeon Shows Support for 2PM
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Hyoyeon has shown her support for 2PM.


On February 25, Hyoyeon shared a photo through her personal Instagram with the message, "#2pm, #2pm6nights." In the revealed photo, Hyoyeon is seen posing with the members of 2PM during their concert 6Nights. Hyoyeon is posing in between the members as they surround her with playful poses.


Meanwhile, 2PM is holding their concert 6Nights at the SK Olympic Handball Gymnasium on February 24-26. This concert is known as one of the final concerts before members Taecyeon and Jun.K begin their mandatory military service.


Photo credit: Hyoyeon Instagra
showTitle: SNSD′s Hyoyeon Shows Support for 2PM

newsNm: [Video] Gugudan Raises Expectations of ′Act.2 Narcissus′ with 2nd Teaser Video
newsDesc:
Gugudan members have risen the expectations of their upcoming release through a second teaser video.


On February 26, Gugudan released the second teaser video for their upcoming title track A Girl Like Me of their 2nd mini album Act.2 Narcissus through their official SNS channels.In the revealed teaser video, member Se Jeong especially catches the attention of fans as she is seen with short hair and standing on a small platform. She is wearing a yellow sweater over a red skirt and gazes mysteriously into the camera.


Meanwhile, Gugudan will be back with their 2nd mini album Act.2 Narcissus and title track A Girl Like Me on February 27.





Photo credit: Jellyfish Entertainment
