newsNm: Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi Shares Photo of Little Sister
newsDesc:
Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi has shared a photo of little sister Evelyn Jeon.


On February 26, Jeon So Mi shared a photo through her personal Instagram with the message, "Realy, you′re my sister, but you′re so pretty.....Wow....She started putting on my lipstick as soon as she came home....She was so pretty...I took photos without realizing it....What are you going to be when you grow up." In the revealed images, Jeon So Mi′s younger sister is seen wearing a yellow sweater and holding a variety of poses for the camera. The similarities between the beautiful sisters is uncanny.


Meanwhile, Evelyn Jeon is 8 years younger than her sister and was born in 2009.


Photo credit: Jeon So Mi Instagram
showTitle: Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi Shares Photo of Little Sister

newsNm: Brave Girls Release Schedule Poster for ′Rollin′
newsDesc:
Girl group Brave Girls have released the schedule poster for their upcoming new album Rollin′.


On February 27, Brave Girls released their schedule from February 28 through March 7, the release of their album Rollin′, through their official fan page and SNS channels. According to the revealed schedule, Brave Girls will begin by releasing teaser images on February 28 followed by releasing their cover image and track list on March 2. The girl group will also release their first music video teaser on March 3, second music video teaser on March 6 and finally, their 4th mini album Rollin′ and music video will be released on March 7.


Brave Girls′ agency Brave Entertainment shared, "Brave Girls′ 4th mini album ′Rollin′′ has been produced by Brave Entertainment′s Brave Brother."


Meanwhile, Brave Girls will be making a comeback on March 7 with their 4th mini album Rollin′.


Photo credit: Brave Entertainment
showTitle: Brave Girls Release Schedule Poster for ′Rollin′

newsNm: BTOB Poses for Chic ′Feel′eM′ Teaser Images
newsDesc:
BTOB has released teaser images for their March 6 comeback.


On March 6, BTOB will be releasing thier 10th mini album Feel′eM and the group has released teaser images through their official SNS channels on February 27. On February 27, BTOB released a group teaser image as well as 7 individual teaser images. The members look chic as they pose with a checkered gray suits.


BTOB has risen the expectations of their upcoming album by releasing Someday of their 10th mini album Feel′eM, which was released in advance on February 24.


Meanwhile, BTOB plans to create special memories with fans by holding their 3rd official fan meeting BTOB′s Secret Room on March 5. Their 10th mini album Feel′eM will be released through a variety of music sites on March 6 at 6PM KST.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: BTOB Poses for Chic ′Feel′eM′ Teaser Images

newsNm: 2PM′s Jun.K Sustains Injury on Stage During Concert
newsDesc:
Boy group 2PM′s Jun.K has sustained an injury while performing on stage during the group′s concert.


On February 27, JYP Entertainment released an official statement revealing, "On February 26, Jun.K was involved in an accident by falling off stage during 2PM′s concert ′6Nights′ at the Seoul Olympic Park SK Olympic Handball Gymnasium."

They continued, "Jun.K was immediately transferred to the hospital and received an examination. The examination results showed that he has suffered from fractures in his right elbow and on the 4th finger of his right hand. He will undergo the appropriate medical treatment and is currently resting and being observed from the staff members. We sincerely apologize for not guaranteeing the safety of our artist and we apologize to our artist and all the fans. We will give an update on his health in the near future."


Meanwhile, 2PM′s concert began on February 24 and the group planned to hold their solo concert at the Seoul Olympic Park SK Olympic Handball Gymnasium until March 5. However, due to Jun.K′s recent injury, the schedule for their upcoming concerts may be changed.


Photo credit: Jun.K Twitter
showTitle: 2PM′s Jun.K Sustains Injury on Stage During Concert

newsNm: [KCON 2017] KCON 2017 Launches Official Website
newsDesc:
The KCON 2017 website is available now!Fans can now visit the website, to find out everything their is to know about this year′s events.


The first upcoming KCON will be taking place in Mexico on March 17-18. The line up will include BTS, Eric Nam, EXID, NCT 127, Astro, Infinite H, MONSTA X and Red Velvet.


Since first beginning in California in 2012, KCON has expanded around the world throughout the years. In 2015, KCON expanded outside of the United States for the first time through their Japan festival. And in 2016, KCON expanded to yet another two countries, adding Abu Dhabi and France to their calendar.


For more information about KCON, check out our comprehensive KCON 2017 section, right here on Mwave.


Photo credit: CJ E&M
showTitle: [KCON 2017] KCON 2017 Launches Official Website

SF9′s Ro Woon has been featured in behind-the-scenes footage from the group′s MEET&GREET visit. SF9′s Ro Woon was selected as the MVP during SF9′s recent visit MEET&GREET. Ro Woon gained the title of MVP after gaining 3 votes from Zu Ho, Young Bin and In Seong.


Find out why Zu Ho, Young Bin and In Seong selected Ro Woon as the MVP and see the compilation of all of Ro Woon′s aegyo moments!


Watch the video below and check out Mwave′s official YouTube channel for more MEET&GREET content.

showTitle: [Video: MEET&GREET] SF9′s Ro Woon Selected as MVP for Aegyo Moments

newsNm: GOT7 Confirms Comeback Date and Releases Schedule Poster
newsDesc:
GOT7 has confirmed their comeback date and released their schedule poster.


On February 27, GOT7′s agency JYP Entertainment released the teaser schedule for GOT7′s upcoming album through their official SNS channels and confirmed their comeback date. Beginning on February 28, GOT7 will be releasing the trailer for their new album Flight Log: Arrival and will continue to tease fans with their track list, comeback photo, album spoilers and more.


Previously, GOT7 mentioned their comeback while holding their fan meeting GOT7 ♥ I GOT7 3RD FAN MEETING on February 5. At the time, they shared that they will be making a comeback sometime in March after completing their concerts.


Meanwhile, GOT7 debuted in 2014 and has been receiving the love of fans with every release. Their most recent album Flight Log: Turbulence, which was released in September 2016, topped Hanteo′s September album chart.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: GOT7 Confirms Comeback Date and Releases Schedule Poster

newsNm: DIA to Make Comeback With Self-Written Track
newsDesc:
Girl group DIA is making a comeback with a self-written track.


On February 27, DIA′s agency MBK Entertainment shared, "DIA is planning to release a new album in mid-April." The album is especially gaining attention as it was revealed that DIA members plan to personally participate in the composing and writing of the tracks.


A representative shared, "They have frequently written and composed during unit promotions and concerts. The new album will be an extension of that."


They continued, "The lyrics will be written by Jung Chae Yeon and other members. Apart from that, Ki Hui Hyeon, Eunice and Yebin will work on the music. We are looking forward to it as all of them play an instrument."


Meanwhile, fans will be able to meet DIA and their new album in April.


Photo credit: MBK Entertainment
showTitle: DIA to Make Comeback With Self-Written Track

newsNm: EXO Successfully Holds Solo Concert in the Philippines
newsDesc:
EXO has successfully completed their solo concert in the Philippines.


On February 25-26, EXO held their concert EXO PLANET #3 - The EXO’rDIUM ? in MANILA at the Araneta Coliseum in the Philippines. Fans were especially excited for the concert as it was their first concert in the Philippines in over a year. EXO opened the concert with a remix version of debut track MAMA and continued the night with performances of hit tracks Roar, Overdose, Love Me Right, Monster, Lucky One and more.


Additionally, they also performed an acoustic medley consisting of tracks Heaven, One and Only from their 3rd studio album; Unfair, Girl x Friend of their winter special album; and My Lady, My Turn to Cry and Moonlight.


Meanwhile, EXO will be holding their concert EXO PLANET #3 - The EXO’rDIUM ? in KUALA LUMPUR in Malaysia on March 18, continuing their 3rd concert tour.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: EXO Successfully Holds Solo Concert in the Philippines

newsNm: Lovelyz′s Yein Injures Ankle During Practice
newsDesc:
Lovelyz′s Yein has injured her ankle during choreography practice.


On February 27, Lovelyz held the showcase for their 2nd studio album R U Ready? at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall after releasing their new album on February 26. While speaking to the audience, Lovelyz shared, "We will show you a new world view through this album."


The new album includes a total of 11 tracks including title track Wow! Wow! topped the real-time music charts as soon as it was released."


However, the youngest member Yein appeared on stage while wearing a cast due to her ankle injury. Yein shared, "I hurt my ankle while preparing for the stage. That is why I came with a cast. I will not be able to dance due to the encouragement of those around me. However, I will be standing to one side of the stage."


Meanwhile, Lovelyz have made a comeback with 2nd studio album R U Ready? and title track Wow!


Photo credit: Woollim Entertainment
showTitle: Lovelyz′s Yein Injures Ankle During Practice

newsNm: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ MV Reaches Over 30 Million Views
newsDesc:
In comparison to the music video for track TT, the new music video exceeded 30 million views faster by 63 hours. TWICE′s popularity is second to Korean artist Psy on YouTube to receive 30 million views quickly and they hold the top record among Kpop idols.


In addition, the Knock Knock music video is especially interesting as it is a continuation of their last TT music video.


Similarly to Like OOH-AHH and Cheer Up, Knock Knock is expected to hit 100 millions views on YouTube.


Meanwhile, Knock Knock is expected to make it′s way up top music charts naturally. TWICE is proving to be a rising global artist as their music video views are increasing day to day.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ MV Reaches Over 30 Million Views

newsNm: BTS′ World Tour to Add Concert Dates in Japan
newsDesc:
BTS has expanded their World Tour into Japan and will be holding a total of 32 concerts in 17 cities in 10 countries.


On February 27, BTS shared a poster showing new concert dates in Japan for their World Your 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR through their official fan website.According to the poster, BTS will begin in Osaka on May 30-June 1 followed by concerts in Hiroshima on June 7, Nagoya on June 14, Saitama on June 20-22, Fukuoka on June 24-25 and Sapporo on July 1-2.


Consequently, BTS′ 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR, which began in Seoul on February 18-19, will take place in 10 countries and 17 cities.


Meanwhile, following their Seoul concert, BTS will hold concerts in Chile on March 11-12 and the group will be touring Brazil, the US, Thailand, Indonesia, the Philippines, Hong Kong and Australia until late May.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS′ World Tour to Add Concert Dates in Japan

newsNm: 2PM′s Jun.K Undergoes Surgery After Concert Incident
newsDesc:
2PM′s Jun.K has undergone surgery after falling off stage during a 2PM concert.


On February 27, 2PM′s agency JYP Entertainment shared news of Jun.K′s surgery through 2PM′s official fan website. JYP stated, "We once again sincerely apologize for the accident that occurred during the concert on the 26th. Jun.K has received surgery to repair his fractured elbow and is currently resting."


"According to the doctor, the surgery went well with no issues. It wasn′t stated in the doctor′s 1st examination but Jun.K has stated he is experiencing pain in his knees and chest. We has discussed this with the doctor and are waiting for a more detailed examination. We will provide updates to our fans as soon as there are updates."


Meanwhile, on February 26, Jun.K has sustained injuries to his right elbow and 4th finger on his right hand after falling off stage during 2PM′s concert 6Nights. At the time, the concert was stopped and Jun.K was immediately rushed to the hospital.


Photo credit: Jun.K Twitter
showTitle: 2PM′s Jun.K Undergoes Surgery After Concert Incident

newsNm: SISTAR′s Hyolyn Signs Contract with Top EDM Label
newsDesc:
Girl group SISTAR′s Hyolyn has signed a record deal with world renown EDM label Spinnin′ Records.


On February 27, SISTAR′s agency Starship Entertainment revealed, "Hyolyn became the first Asian, the first k-pop artist to sign with world′s top EDM record label Spinnin′ Records. She plans to collaborate with Justin Oh for a global release in March." Spinnin′ Records is from the Netherlands and is currently the most influential label in the EDM scene. Previous artists that have worked with the label include Martin Garrix, Hardwell and Tiesto.


Hyolyn has also been gaining attention as she revealed plans to attend this year′s SXSW in Austin, Texas in March and will also be holding a club tour in Los Angeles and New York.


Meanwhile, Hyolyn consistently worked with global artists including Far East Movement with their track Umbrella and Italian composer Giorgio Moroder.


Photo credit: Starship Entertainment
showTitle: SISTAR′s Hyolyn Signs Contract with Top EDM Label

newsNm: [Video] Gugudan Makes Comeback with ′A Girl Like Me′
newsDesc:
Girl group Gugudan has made a comeback with the release of A Girl Like Me.


On February 27, Gugudan released their 2nd mini album Act. 2 Narcissus through a variety of music sites and also released the music video for title track A Girl Like Me.Title track A Girl Like Me has an upbeat tempo and talks about a girl who is trying to show off her charm and confess her love after falling in love. The repetitive beat is especially catchy as it is energetic and captures the attention of fans.


In the revealed music video, the 9 members of Gugudan show off their individual charm in 9 different ways. They are each featured in a unique scene and look completely different from one another.


Gugudan 2nd mini album Act. 2 Narcissus includes a total of 6 tracks including title track A Girl Like Me, Rainbow, Starting To Hate You and the instrumental to A Girl Like Me.


Meanwhile, after releasing Act. 2 Narcissus on February 27, Gugudan will be holding their first comeback stage at the Yes24 Live Hall on February 28.





Photo credit: Jellyfish Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Gugudan Makes Comeback with ′A Girl Like Me′

newsNm: SNSD Taeyeon′s ′My Voice′ Sells 110,000 Copies in Presales
newsDesc:
SNSD′s main vocalist Taeyeon has sold over 110,000 copies in presales of her upcoming 1st studio album My Voice.


On February 28 at noon, Taeyeon released her 1st studio album My Voice.
According to her agency SM Entertainment, presales for My Voice exceeded 114,000 copies before the official release, which is a new record as a female solo artist.


Taeyeon will be appearing on a live broadcast through SMTOWN′s Naver V Live on March 2 to talk about her new album. Additionally, she will begin promotions with her first comeback stage on KBS 2TV′s Music Bank on March 3.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon′s 1st studio album My Voice and title track Fine will be available through a variety of music sites on February 28.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD Taeyeon′s ′My Voice′ Sells 110,000 Copies in Presales

newsNm: Red Velvet Shares Thoughts on Attending ′SXSW′
newsDesc:
Red Velvet has shared their thoughts on attending this year′s SXSW with Drunken Tiger.


On February 28, Red Velvet shared their thoughts by stating, "It is an honor to be able to honorably stand on stage with our sunbaes. We will show a stage that will remain in your memories as sweet and fresh, just like Red Velvet."

Drunken Tiger also shared, "First, thank you. It is an honor to stand on stage with Red Velvet."


They also shared their advice to their hoobaes saying, "We don′t think it′s bad to just dig one well. I think opportunities will come if you dig a well and give it your all. We think it′s important to stick to your own vision."


Meanwhile, other artists attending this year′s SXSW include Drunken Tiger, Yoon Mirae, Red Velvet, Galaxy Express, Big Phony, No Brain, MC Sniper, Sultan Of The Disco, Biuret, The Monotones and more.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: Red Velvet Shares Thoughts on Attending ′SXSW′

newsNm: BTOB′s Jung Il Hoon, Lim Hyun Sik and More Credited on ′Feel′eM′ Track List
newsDesc:
BTOB, who is awaiting the release of their 10th mini album Feel′eM, has released the track list.


On March 6, BTOB will be dropping their 10th mini album Feel′eM through a variety of music sites and have released the track list through their official SNS channels on February 28. According to the revealed track list, Feel′eM will include a total of 5 tracks including title track Movie and tracks Only Talk (literal translation), About Time, Rock N Hiphop and Someday.


The track list is especially gaining the attention of fans as BTOB members are credited in multiple tracks. Member Jung Il Hoon wrote, composed and arranged title track Movie as well as participated in writing the lyrics for multiple tracks. Additionally, member Lim Hyun Sik participated in the composing, writing and arranging of tracks Only Talk (literal translation), About Time and Someday.


Meanwhile, BTOB′s 10th mini album Feel′eM will be released through a variety of music sites on March 6. On March 5, the day before the album release, BTOB plans to meet with fans through their 3rd official fan meeting BTOB′s Secret Room.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: BTOB′s Jung Il Hoon, Lim Hyun Sik and More Credited on ′Feel′eM′ Track List

newsNm: [Video] SNSD′s Taeyeon Tops Music Charts With ′Fine′
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon has topped charts with her new title track Fine.


On February 28 at noon, Taeyeon dropped her 1st solo studio album My Voice. As of 2PM on the day of it′s release, title track Fine topped Korea music charts Melon, Genie, Olleh Music, Soribada, Naver Music and Bugs. Additionally, other tracks from the album Feel So Fine, Cover Up, I Got Love, Time Lapse and I′m Ok also showed success on the music charts as well.


If this pattern continues, it will be a matter of time before Taeyeon achieves a music chart all-kill.


Meanwhile, earlier in the day, Taeyeon′s agency SM Entertainment revealed that the singer set a new record as a female solo artist by selling over 114,000 copies of My Voice in presales.





Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] SNSD′s Taeyeon Tops Music Charts With ′Fine′

newsNm: Sulli and Dynamic Duo′s Choiza Confirm Break Up
newsDesc:
Actress Sulli and Dynamic Duo′s Choiza have confirmed their break up.


On March 6, a representative of Sulli′s agency SM Entertainment shared, "It is true that Sulli and Choiza have broken up. They have decided to remain as good sunbae and hoobae." However, they did not explain the exact time of the break up nor did they explain the reason. Meanwhile, Sulli and Choiza began their public relationship in 2014. While they were in the while of break up rumors throughout the years, they continued to show their affection for each other through their social media and variety show appearances.


However, due to their individual busy schedules, Sulli and Choiza have parted ways after dating for 2 years and 7 months.


Photo credit: Sulli Instagram
showTitle: Sulli and Dynamic Duo′s Choiza Confirm Break Up

newsNm: T-ara Confirmed to Make Comeback in May
newsDesc:
Girl group T-ara will be making a comeback as a whole group in May.


After releasing their 12th mini album Remember in November 2016 with title track Tiamo, T-ara will be releasing their 13th mini album in May.T-ara′s last title track Ti Amo was their first title track that wasn′t a dance track since their debut. It was a medium tempo track and recieved the love of many fans.


Accordingly, fans are looking forward to what genre T-ara will choose for their upcoming album.


Meanwhile, T-ara, who debuted 8 years ago, have teased fans of their 13th album and will officially begin preparations for the album.


Photo credit: MBK Entertainment
showTitle: T-ara Confirmed to Make Comeback in May

newsNm: CNBLUE Revealed to be Preparing for March Comeback
newsDesc:
Boy band CNBLUE have confirmed their March comeback.


On March 6, CBLUE′s agency FNC Entertainment shared, "CNBLUE are filmiing their music video today and plan to make a comeback at the end of March." The upcoming album marks CNBLUE′s first Korean release in almost one year since releasing their 6th mini album Blueming with title track You′re So Fine in April 2016.


Meanwhile, CNBLUE will be joining groups GFriend, BTOB and Highlight in the March comeback lineup.


Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: CNBLUE Revealed to be Preparing for March Comeback

newsNm: [Poll] Which Idol Do You Want to Meet Again on MEET&GREET?
newsDesc:
Many top idols have passed through Mwave′s MEET&GREET and they are continuing to meet with their global fans through the online fan meeting.


If you could only choose one idol group to meet again, who would you choose? It might be difficult to answer, but check out the idols below and let us know! BTS


During their visit to MEET&GREET, BTS talked about their album Dark & Wild. They went into details and revealed information that fans may or may not have known about.


Do you want to hear more of BTS′ back story behind their albums? 20170307/40477646.jpgEXID


On one of their visits to MEET&GREET, member Hani tried her luck at the Black Boozled challenge. She took a bite of the black jelly bean and traumatized by the taste.


Click on EXID if you want to see more funny moments with them!20170307/68678255.jpgMAMAMOO


We know that MAMAMOO members′ voices are some of the most soulful in k-pop, and some lucky fans were able to hear them first hand during their visit to MEET&GREET when they sang tracks from their album Piano Man.


Are you prepared to be captured by MAMAMOO′s vocals? 20170307/51783687.jpgSeventeen


The boys of Seventeen are great at singing and performing, but did you know that they also know how to act? During their last visit to Seventeen, members Hoshi, Mingyu and Joshua acted out a boyfriend and girlfriend seen to fulfill a request by a fan.


Who knows, maybe Seventeen will show off another unknown skill during their next visit to MEET&GREET.20170307/26416029.jpgAPINK


APINK is one of Korea′s top k-pop girl groups and they haven′t shown their faces at MEET&GREET for a while.


If you think it′s been too long since their last visit, vote for APINK!


Now it’s time to vote!
showTitle: [Poll] Which Idol Do You Want to Meet Again on MEET&GREET?

newsNm: Highlight AKA BEAST Releases Second Concept Photos
newsDesc:
Boy group Highlight, formerly known as BEAST, has released a second set of concept photos for their upcoming album Can You Feel It?.


On March 7, Highlight′s agency Around US Entertainment rose the expectations for the group′s return by releasing more concept photos of their 1st mini album Can You Feel It? through their official SNS channels. In the revealed photos, members Yoon Du Joon, Yong Jun Hyung, Yang Yo Seop, Lee Gi Kwang and Son Dong Woon can be seen sitting around a table together while enjoying pizza.


Additionally, beginning at 7PM KST on March 6, individual concept images of each member were also released every hour.


Meanwhile, Around US Entertainment previously confirmed Highlight as the name of the new group formed by former BEAST members Yoon Du Joon, Yong Jun Hyung, Yang Yo Seop, Lee Gi Kwang and Son Dong Woon. The members are resuming promotions 2 months after officially leaving former agency Cube Entertainment.


Their new album Can You Feel It? will be officially released on March 20 while a track will be pre-released on March 13.


Photo credit: Around US Entertainment
showTitle: Highlight AKA BEAST Releases Second Concept Photos

newsNm: Sechs Kies to Travel to Hawaii for 20th Anniversary
newsDesc:
Boy group Sech Kies, who are celebrating 20 years since their debut this year, are traveling to Hawaii.


According to a representative, five members of Sech Kies, excluding member Ko Ji Yong, will be traveling to Hawaii on March 6.Sech Kies plan to meet fans with their new album and concerts. Additionally, leading up to their official promotions, Sech Kies members will also participate in a photo shoot during their stay in Hawaii. It seems that Sech Kies, who plan to actively promote during their 20th anniversary year, have started the engine to their 2017 activities.


Meanwhile, Sech Kies made headlines in 2016 when they announced plans for a reunion after 16 years. Throughout the year, Sech Kies members actively appeared in variety programs and also received several awards during year-end award ceremonies. Similar to last year, Sech Kies plans to create special memories with fans through a variety of outlets and platforms.


Photo credit: YG Entertainment
showTitle: Sechs Kies to Travel to Hawaii for 20th Anniversary

newsNm: GFriend Meets Fans Through Broadcast Following Release of ′Fingertip′
newsDesc:
GFriend has met with fans through a live broadcast following the release of their new track Fingertip.


On March 6, GFriend members appeared on Naver V App with a special Fingertip Comeback Live broadcast.GFriend appeared with toy guns and showed their trademark "Tang Tang Tang" while saying, "It′s been 8 hours since ′Fingertip′ was released." They shared that upon the release of Fingertip, friends and family showed their positive reaction towards the track and "Tang Tang Tang." SinB shared, "Our 4th mini album has already been released. It′s already our 5th album overall. I think it′s amazing."


GFriend shared how much they changed and matured leading up to their comeback. They were amazed at how they formed muscles after exercising in preparations for the comeback. Additionally, Umji shared that she purchased a trampoline and has been using it with Yuju.


Additionally, throughout the broadcast, GFriend created a closer relationship with fans by sharing their personal stories.


Meanwhile, GFriend released their 4th mini album The Awakening at noon on March 6 and will be actively promoting new title track Fingertip.


Photo credit: Naver V app screen capture
showTitle: GFriend Meets Fans Through Broadcast Following Release of ′Fingertip′

newsNm: BTOB Successfully Completes Fan Meeting ′BTOB′s Secret Room′
newsDesc:
BTOB has successfully completed their 3rd official fan meeting.


On March 5, BTOB met with 5,500 fans through their 3rd official fan meeting BTOB′s Secret Room at the Hwajung Gymnasium at Korea University. The fan meeting, which was completely sold out, was BTOB′s first official fan meeting since their 2nd fan meeting was held in February 2016.


To match the fan meeting title BTOB′s Secret Room, the concept of the event was for BTOB members and the fans to look a key and escape. Additionally, BTOB captured the hearts of fans by performing tracks from their new 10th mini album Feel′eM for the first time.


Meanwhile, BTOB, who released their 10th mini album Feel′eM on March 6, will officially begin promotion.


Photo credit: Cube Entertainment
showTitle: BTOB Successfully Completes Fan Meeting ′BTOB′s Secret Room′

newsNm: Eric Nam and Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi to Release Collaboration
newsDesc:
Artist Eric Nam′s new collaboration partner is revealed to be former I.O.I member Jeon So Mi.


On March 7, Eric Nam shared a teaser image of his upcoming collaboration with Jeon So Mi through his personal SNS channels.

In the revealed image, Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi are seen smiling as they are sitting side by side on arm chairs. They are both wearing preppy styled clothes. A red string connecting Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi by their pinky fingers is especially eye-catching.


The upcoming track will mark Jeon So Mi′s first solo track after promoting with project girl group I.O.I for the last year. Additionally, starting with the upcoming track You, Who?, Eric Nam plans to release a new track every spring under the project Spring Note.


Meanwhile, Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi′s new track You, Who? will be released through a variety of music sites on March 9 at 6PM KST.


Photo credit: CJ E&M, B2M Entertainment
showTitle: Eric Nam and Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi to Release Collaboration

newsNm: GOT7′s ′Just Right′ Exceeds 100 Million Views Leading Up To New Album Release
newsDesc:
GOT7′s Just Right music video has exceeded 100 million views leading up to the release of the group′s new album.


On March 6, the music video for GOT7′s track Just Right, which was released in July 2015, exceeded 100 million views on only the official video shared through JYP Entertainment′s YouTube channel. Accordingly, GOT7 became the 5th k-pop boy group to exceed 100 million views on a music video following groups Big Bang, Super Junior, EXO and BTS.


Meanwhile, GOT7 is awaiting the release of their new mini album Flight Log: Arrival, which is set to release on March 13. Title track Never Ever is said to be a powerful futuristic hip hop track that was written and composed with the help of JYP Entertainment′s Park Jin Young.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: GOT7′s ′Just Right′ Exceeds 100 Million Views Leading Up To New Album Release

newsNm: CNBLUE Releases 7th Mini Album Comeback Poster
newsDesc:
Boy band CNBLUE has released their comeback poster for their upcoming 7th mini album.


On March 20, CNBLUE will be making a comeback with their 7th mini album 7℃N. CNBLUE, who is going into their 7th year since debuting, will talk about their last 7 years through the upcoming album 7℃N.


The album marks CNBLUE′s first Korea release in 1 year since releasing Blueming in April 2016. Since then, the members have been active inside and outside of Korea appearing in movies, dramas, concerts and more.


Meanwhile, CNBLUE′s 7℃N will begin presales on March 7 and the album will officially be released on March 20. The group plans to release their album cover image, individual member images and more leading up to the release.


Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: CNBLUE Releases 7th Mini Album Comeback Poster

newsNm: 等不及要看了！ 外傳男版《PRODUCE 101》4月播
newsDesc:
從Mnet《PRODUCE 101》第一季選拔出的女團I.O.I在海內外獲得極大的成功，因此第二季?外受到關注，外傳《PRODUCE 101》第二季將接?《高中Rapper》，於4月初首播，但相關人員出面否認，表示:“?未決定《PRODUCE 101》第二季的播出日期。”

《PRODUCE 101》第一季以各大經紀公司的女練習生?主，透過觀?票選的方式，從101人中選出11人組團出道，展開?期一年活動。

《PRODUCE 101》第二季改以男練習生?主，目前確定參加的有來自Fantagio、Pledis、Cube、JELLYFISH、Brandnewmusic、RBW的練習生，由天后級歌手BoA擔任主持人。 照片來源:Mnet
showTitle: 等不及要看了！ 外傳男版《PRODUCE 101》4月播

newsNm: CNBLUE邁入第7個年頭 迷你7輯《7℃N》獻粉絲
newsDesc:
花美男樂團CNBLUE將於20日?迷?7輯《7℃N》，今年是CNBLUE出道第7年，因此外界都在觀望，他們是否能藉由這張專輯，再創事業全盛期。

CNBLUE隔1年以‘完整體’發片，FNC娛樂表示:“這張專輯蘊含著?富感情。無論是誰，一生之中總會感受到感情的溫度，他們把這樣的溫度融化在音樂裡。”

去年4月發行完迷?6輯《BLUEMING》之後，在日本展開一連串的巡?演唱會，成員們也各自忙於個人事業，鄭容和出演電影《鋒味江湖之決戰食神》、姜敏赫拍SBS《?子》、李正信拍tvN《灰姑娘與四騎士》等，這次以‘完整體’回歸韓國樂壇，讓許多粉絲興奮不已。 照片來源: FNC娛樂
showTitle: CNBLUE邁入第7個年頭 迷你7輯《7℃N》獻粉絲

newsNm: 【專訪】GFriend、TWICE一樣火 私人關係又如何？
newsDesc:
超人氣女團GFriend昨天(6日)發行迷?6輯《The Awakening》，主打歌《FINGERTIP》一公開?衝上Bugs、Ollehmusic、Genie、Soribada、Naver Music等音源排行榜的冠軍，火爆度和TWICE不相上下，因此兩隊經常被拿出來比較，外界也相當好奇彼此的關係。

所願、睿隣、銀河、裕株、神秘與嚴智今天接受韓媒訪問，聊到出道時間相差不到一年，差不多是一個平起平坐的TWICE時，所願說:“TWICE是?好的朋友，我們走得?近。”、“我們是關係好的同行，不想把對方視?競爭對手。”

所願接著說:“當然，有競爭對手是件好事。那樣的話，我們才會更磨練自己，不停地自我發展，我想那能?創造雙?的局面。”

?使認?有競爭對手能加速成長，所願表示:“我們?TWICE經常互相加油，?們都?漂亮，還說聽了我們的歌曲，我們會發訊息給對方。”、“?們是帶給我們?大刺激的朋友兼同行。” 照片來源:Source Music
showTitle: 【專訪】GFriend、TWICE一樣火 私人關係又如何？

newsNm: GFRIEND妖豔跳《Rough》 鄭亨敦關音樂下評語...
newsDesc:
‘小女友’GFRIEND?在MBC every1《一週的偶像》跳‘2倍速舞蹈’打響名號，這次新歌《FINGERTIP》的打歌活動當然也不會漏了該節目，而且還首秀暢銷曲《Rough》的性感版本，賣力得不得了。

GFRIEND出演的《一》節目將於明天(8日)播出，‘忙內line’神秘與嚴智今年高中畢業，全員在出道兩年後均成年，成員許願:“天氣變暖之後，想一起吃‘??(炸?配?酒)’。”

主持人聽了提議:“?們都成年了，那?能不能看?們展現性感的一面??”對性感路線充滿野心的銀河挑戰性感舞蹈，不過連成員們都看不下去，替?感到害羞。

GFRIEND接著跳暢銷曲《Rough》的性感版本，不過主持人鄭亨敦看不下去，緊急暫停了音樂之後，下了評論:“?們果然性感不起來，沒辦法就是沒辦法。” 照片來源:MBC every1
showTitle: GFRIEND妖豔跳《Rough》 鄭亨敦關音樂下評語...

newsNm: 【Special】不悔脫清純制服 GFriend自信稱：準備好了！
newsDesc:
超人氣女團GFriend日前發行迷?6輯《The Awakening》，主打歌《FINGERTIP》一公開?衝上Bugs、Ollehmusic、Genie、Soribada、Naver Music等音源排行榜的冠軍，《FINGERTIP》MV至今在YouTube已經累積86萬的點擊率，?們這次擺脫?純學生妹的形象，以軍裝造型的女戰士示人，成員們皆表示:“不後悔!”

所願、睿隣、銀河、裕株、神秘與嚴智昨天(7日)接受韓媒訪問，所願說:“準備這張專輯期間，一半擔心、一半心動，因?我們在造形上做了變化。”、“預告曝光之後，?多人開始關注我們，我們第一次因?預告而登上熱搜排行。我都不敢睡，看完完成品曝光後才睡。雖然?擔心，但托大家的福，我們有了努力的動力。”

外界對?們的評價?왁黎拿授?們表示:“我們還沒在音樂節目上表演過新歌，?期待大家的反應。”、“歌詞中，最喜歡的一句台詞是‘都準備好了’，我們不會穿不適合我們、別人覺得不適合我們的衣服就回歸，公司代表也認?我們準備好了。”

GFriend出道以來，一直都是走校園路線，這次首次小女人的造型亮相，?們自信地表示:“從來沒有過‘回到過去??樣?好後悔’，反而心想‘這不是盡頭’。”

接著說:“我們一開始對這次歌曲不是?有信心，直到拍MV了的刀群舞?才確信會受歡迎，當時的氣??好，心想‘我們一定要在音樂節目上表演’，非常的期待。”

此外，GFriend將於3月參加Mwave《MEET&GREET》，在Mwave商城購買有?們親簽的迷?6輯《The Awakening》，不只有機會抽到照片?，買最多張的粉絲還可獲得拍立得相片。


照片來源:Source Music
showTitle: 【Special】不悔脫清純制服 GFriend自信稱：準備好了！

newsNm: 【Special】GFriend摔倒慘被酸炒作 裕株忍不住紅了眼框
newsDesc:
‘女朋友’GFriend出道2年多，初期因全團不畏在大雨中滑倒，連續多次?了再跳的敬業態度受到不少外媒關注，不過也有人質疑?們是自編自導自演，?譽參半。

GFriend昨天(6日)?迷?6輯《The Awakening》受訪，所願說:“我一則以喜一則以憂，如果不是因?滑倒，可能不會像現在一樣出名，但也有人說我們是九死一生，心裡?難過。”、“滑倒事件之前，睿隣在宣傳《Glass Bead》期間上SBS《Running Man》，因?表現的?好，所以歌曲在排行榜前幾名內停留了?長一段時間，《Me Gustas Tu》也打進32名。不過還是會邊想‘發了兩張迷?專輯，有?多人關注我們?’，邊擔心‘該??辦??’。

嚴智說:“雖然?多人因?跌倒事件變有名，但我們?不是因?跌倒而受到喜愛，是因?跌倒又爬起來表演，敬業的樣子受到喜愛，所以?難過別人說我們‘跌倒才紅的’。我認?我們是因??使跌倒也用心演唱，所以才受到歡迎的。” 跌倒的當事人裕株表示:“一提到這件是就?咽，有人還說跌倒又不會太痛。“語畢眼睛就泛紅，看到?哭，嚴智和所願也濕了眼?。

銀河說:“?感謝裕株?使跌這?慘也爬起來跳，但看了?跌倒的影片就心痛。有人還問那是不是舞蹈的亮點。”所願說:“好像是因?別人說‘再痛能有多痛’，所以感到特別的心寒。”

心情稍微平復之後，裕株說:“跌倒不痛，再站起來表演是應該的事。別人因此稱讚我，我不知道我?不?得那樣的讚美，我努力不讓自己那樣的態度，那對我來說是?難忘的舞台。”

接著說:“我不希望被誤會是故意跌倒的，以後如果在雨中表演，我會盡量減少?部移動的動作，手的動作做大一點，這樣就會比較安全。”

此外，GFriend將於3月參加Mwave《MEET&GREET》，在Mwave商城購買有?們親簽的迷?6輯《The Awakening》，不只有機會抽到照片?，買最多張的粉絲還可獲得拍立得相片。


照片來源:Source Music

人氣男團BTOB昨天(6日)發行迷?10輯《Feel′eM》，主打歌《MOVIE》今天衝上Melon、Naver Music、Genie等音源網站?時榜冠軍，成員們透過媒體表達對粉絲的感謝，隊長徐恩光表示:“?心感謝喜愛BTOB音樂?給予支持的Melody(粉絲名稱)!”

newsNm: Twice′s ′TT′ MV Exceeds 150 Million Views
newsDesc:
Twice′s TT music video, which was released on October 23 of last year, has exceeded over 150 million views on YouTube.


This is a new record set by a Korean artist aside from Psy. Previously, the music video for Twice′s TT exceeded 10 million views within 40 hours, 30 million views within 8 days and 50 million views within 21 days. Additionally, the music video continued to rise in popularity by hitting 100 million views on January 3 of this year. The music videos for their tracks Cheer Up and Like Ooh-Aah also respectively exceeded 140 million and 130 million views as of March 7.


Twice′s new track Knock Knock is also quickly rising in views, much faster than TT, and is expected to beat TT′s records. The music video hit 40 million views in 274 hours, which is 74 hours faster than TT.


Meanwhile, Twice is actively promoting new title track TT.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice′s ′TT′ MV Exceeds 150 Million Views

newsNm: GFriend to Hold First Fan Meeting Since Debut
newsDesc:
Girl group GFriend is holding their first fan meeting since their debut.


On April 2, GFriend will hold their first official fan meeting since their debut over 2 years ago at the Olympic Hall located in the Olympic Park.


The fan meeting titled Dear Buddy, will be prepared for the fans who have poured their hearts to GFriend throughout the last 2 years. GFriend wants to take this opportunity to show their love for their fans.


They will create special memories with their fans in a close proximity. And as much as the fan meeting marks GFriend′s first in 2 years, fans are showing their interest and support. Although Dear Buddy is their first fan meeting, the group has prepared 3,000 seats for their fans.


Currently, GFriend is actively promoting new track Fingertip, which was released on March 6.


Meanwhile, ticketing for GFriend′s first fan meeting since their debut Dear Buddy will open on March 16 at 8PM KST.


Photo credit: Source Music
showTitle: GFriend to Hold First Fan Meeting Since Debut

newsNm: B.A.P Holds Broadcast to Introduce New Album ′Rose′
newsDesc:
Male idol group B.A.P has held a broadcast to introduce their new album Rose and title track Wake Me Up.


On March 7, B.A.P appeared on a broadcast through Naver V app.During the broadcast, B.A.P went through all the new tracks of their 6th single album Rose. In regards to the title track, "They shared, "We were worried that our emotions will not get across, but it came out better than the guide. So we were all surprised."


Additionally, B.A.P also shared stories behind the making of the music video for title track Wake Me Up.


Meanwhile, B.A.P made a comeback with title track Wake Me Up of their 6th single album Rose, which was released on March 7.


Photo credit: Naver V app screen capture
showTitle: B.A.P Holds Broadcast to Introduce New Album ′Rose′

newsNm: PRISTIN Releases Debut Promotion Schedule
newsDesc:
New girl group PRISTIN releases debut promotion schedule.


On March 7, PRISTIN released their debut promotion schedule poster through their official SNS channels.According to the schedule, PRISTIN will begin releasing concept photos on March 9-10 and this will be followed by the album cover and title release on March 13, track list reveal on March 14, highlight medley on March 15, music video teaser on March 18-19 and finally, PRISTIN′s 1st mini album Hi! PRISTIN will release on March 21.


A representative of their agency Pledis Entertainment shared, "After confirming their debut, PRISTIN is attracting the attention of any people. Expectations are high to see how the 10 girls will appear to fans and what kind of concept they will have."


PRISTIN marks Pledis Entertainment′s second girl group after the girl group After School.


Meanwhile, the members of PRISTIN were first introduced to fans through Mnet′s Produce 101 in 2016 and the girls have also promoted under the name Pledis Girlz before forming PRISTIN.


Photo credit: Pledis Entertainment
showTitle: PRISTIN Releases Debut Promotion Schedule

newsNm: [Video] LOOΠΔ to Promote First Unit Group Album
newsDesc:
Rookie group LOOΠΔ will be promoting their first unit group album under LOOΠΔ 1/3.


On March 8, LOOΠΔ′s agency Block Berry Creative shared that LOOΠΔ 1/3 will be releasing their 1st unit album Love & Live through a variety of music sites on March 13. LOOΠΔ began releasing new members of the group each month beginning in October 2016. The members promoting through the first unit group LOO?奎?1/3 include Hee Jin, Hyun Jin, Ha Seul and Vivi.


Leading up to their album release, on March 8, LOOΠΔ shared a teaser video of the members in New Zealand through their official SNS channels. The members are seen traveling to New Zealand by plane and cameras follow them as they shop.


Meanwhile, LOOΠΔ 1/3′s first unit album Love & Live will be released through a variety of music sites on March 13.





Photo credit: Block Berry Creative
showTitle: [Video] LOOΠΔ to Promote First Unit Group Album

newsNm: Jay Park to Drop First Single of 2017
newsDesc:
Jay Park is releasing his first single of 2017.


On March 7, Jay Park′s agency AOMG surprised fans by releasing a teaser photo for Jay Park′s new track Huld Hogan through their official SNS channels. Producer Woogie helped produce Jay Park′s upcoming track Hulk Hogan and it will mark the singer′s first release since releasing his R&B album Everything You Wanted at the end of 2016.


In February, Jay Park gained the attention of music fans by receiving the Musician of the Year award at the 14th annual Korean Music Awards.


Meanwhile, Jay Park′s single Hulk Hogan will be released through a variety of music sites on March 8.


Photo credit: AOMG
showTitle: Jay Park to Drop First Single of 2017

newsNm: [Video] Eric Nam and Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi Drops ′You, Who?′ MV Teaser
newsDesc:
Eric Nam and Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi have dropped a music video teaser.


On March 8, Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi were featured in a music video teaser for their upcoming collaboration You, Who?.In the revealed image, Eric and Jeon So Mi are seen sitting next to each other while the sound of a guitar can be heard in the background. The pair look like characters from a fairy tale as Jeon So Mi looks sweet and beautiful and Eric Nam looks clean and handsome.


The upcoming collaboration You, Who? is an acoustic medium tempo track.


You, Who? marks Jeon So Mi′s first solo track after promoting with project girl group I.O.I for the last year. Additionally, starting with the upcoming track You, Who?, Eric Nam plans to release a new track every spring under the project Spring Note.


Meanwhile, Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi′s new track You, Who? will be released through a variety of music sites on March 9 at 6PM KST.





Photo credit: CJ E&M, B2M Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Eric Nam and Former I.O.I Member Jeon So Mi Drops ′You, Who?′ MV Teaser
findKywrd: Eric Nam, I.O.I, Jeon So Mi (I.O.I)

newsNm: B.A.P Reaches Number 6 on iTunes ′Worldwide Album Chart′
newsDesc:
Boy group B.A.P has reached number 6 on iTunes′ Worldwide Album Chart.


On March 7, B.A.P released their 6th single album Rose and the album reached number 6 on iTunes′ Worldwide Album Chart within it′s first day of release. B.A.P is listed alongside world famous artists Ed Sheeran, Adele, Bruno Mars and Beyonce. Additionally, as soon as Rose was released, the album also reached number 2 in Russia, Finland, Norway and Thailand.


The group, who made a return with all 6 members, had previously reached number 12 on iTunes′ Worldwide Album Chart with their 2nd studio album Noir, which was released in November 2016, and also became the first Korean artist to top Billboard′s World Albums Chart.


Meanwhile, the rising global idols B.A.P plan to actively promote title track Wake Me Up of their new single album Rose. On March 24-26, the group will also be holding their concert B.A.P 2017 World Your ′PartyBaby! - Seoul Boom at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall.


Photo credit: TS Entertainment
showTitle: B.A.P Reaches Number 6 on iTunes ′Worldwide Album Chart′

newsNm: Apink to Release 7th Japan Single ′Bye Bye′
newsDesc:
Girl group Apink is releasing their 7th Japanese single album Bye Bye.


On March 8, Apink′s agency Plan A Entertainment revealed that the group would be releasing their 7th Japanese album Bye Bye on March 29. To commemorate their new album, Apink will be holding events throughout Japan from March 30 until April 2. Title track Bye Bye of the upcoming album of the same name will talk about growth after a break up. It will be a dance track with emotional lyrics.


Meanwhile, Apink has been rising as a k-pop artist in Japan with their last single album Summer Time!, which released in August 2016, reaching number 2 on Oricon′s weekly chart. Expectations are equally high for their upcoming 7th album Bye Bye.


Photo credit: Plan A Entertainment
showTitle: Apink to Release 7th Japan Single ′Bye Bye′

他們交往兩個月後戀情曝光，去年11月公開戀情，不過愛火燒了6個月就熄滅，如今從情人當回同事。

newsNm: miss A′s Min and G.Soul Confirmed to Have Broken Up
newsDesc:
Girl group miss A′s Min and artist G.Soul have confirmed to be broken up only 4 months after going public with their relationship.


On March 8, Min and G.Soul′s agency JYP Entertainment shared, "The pair have recently broken up." Min and G.Soul became close while both artists trained in the US before their debut. Last November, they confirmed their relationship and it has been revealed that the couple dated for about 6 months before breaking up.


Meanwhile, G.Soul is awaiting his military enlistment and while he initially decided to enlist as a conscripted policeman, he changed his decision to enlist as an active-duty soldier instead.


Photo credit: Min Instagram
showTitle: miss A′s Min and G.Soul Confirmed to Have Broken Up

newsNm: Twice to Complete Promotions With ′Knock Knock′
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice is finalizing their promotions with title track Knock Knock.


On March 8, Twice′s agency JYP Entertainment shared, "On March 12, Twice will finalize their 3 week long promotions with ′Knock Knock.′"
Twice will be performing their final stages on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on March 9 and on SBS′ Inkigayo on March 12. Title track Knock Knock was released on February 20 and has topped top Korean music sites including Mnet, Melon, Naver Music and more during the last few weeks.


Although TWICEcoaster: Lane 2 was a special album, as of March 8, the album has sold over 270,000 copies according to Gaon Chart. The music video for title track Knock Knock is also expected to exceed 50 million views in the near future.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice to Complete Promotions With ′Knock Knock′

newsNm: [Video] Romeo Makes Comeback with ′Without U′
newsDesc:
Boy group Romeo has made a comeback with Without U.


On March 8, Romeo made a comeback into the music scene with the release of their 4th mini album Without U. The album follows Romeo′s 3rd mini album Miro, which was released in June 2016. In addition to the album release, Romeo also dropped the music video for title track Without U. Without U is a dance track with a new jack swing genre that talks about the broken and empty heart after a break up. The track was produced with the help of top producer team Brave Brothers.


Meanwhile, Romeo will perform their first comeback stage with Without U through Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on March 9.





Photo credit: Romeo ′Without U′ MV screen capture
showTitle: [Video] Romeo Makes Comeback with ′Without U′

newsNm: [Mwave shop] MEET&GREET GFriend and Get Signed ′THE AWAKENING′ Album
newsDesc:
GFriend is back with new title track Fingertip and they will be stopping by Mwave′s MEET&GREET! GFriend′s 4th mini album The Awakening, signed by all members, is available in 2 versions at Mwave shop now.


During the live MEET&GREET, GFriend will choose 7 out of 49 tiles to receive GFriend photo cards, exclusively available at Mwave.


The Top 2-5 supporters will receive a mini Polaroid photo signed by one random member, while the Top 1 supporter will receive an all members signed wide group Polaroid photo.


GFriend is stopping by Mwave sometime in March, so keep an eye out for the exact date and tune into the live MEET&GREET, only on Mwave!


Photo credit: Source Music
showTitle: [Mwave shop] MEET&GREET GFriend and Get Signed ′THE AWAKENING′ Album

During the live MEET&GREET, B.A.P will choose 7 out of 49 tiles to receive B.A.P photo cards, exclusively available at Mwave.

newsNm: Former I.O.I Member Kim So Hye Wishes Jeon So Mi a ′Happy Birthday′
newsDesc:
Former I.O.I member Kim So Hye has wished fellow member Jeon So Mi a happy birthday.


On March 9, Kim So Hye shared a video through her personal Instagram.In the revealed video, Kim So Hye is seen with birthday girl Jeon So Mi. They are seen holding cute poses while animated ears and whiskers are drawn on their faces.


Along the with video, Kim So Hye also shared her best wished to Jeon So Mi by writing, "Som′s birthday. Eat a lot of good food and have a joyful birthday with the many well wishes from friends."


Meanwhile, Kim So Hye and Jeon So Mi appeared together in Mnet′s Produce 101 and promoted in the project girl group I.O.I until early this year.


Photo credit: Kim So Hye Instagram
showTitle: Former I.O.I Member Kim So Hye Wishes Jeon So Mi a ′Happy Birthday′

newsNm: GFriend to Perform Comeback Stage Through ′M COUNTDOWN′
newsDesc:
Girl group GFriend is performing their first comeback stage with Fingertip.


GFriend, who recently released their 4th mini album The Awakening, will be performing their first comeback stage through Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on March 9. During their comeback stage, GFriend plans to perform new title track Fingertip along with track Hear the Wind Sing. Fans are looking forward to see GFriend′s new concept through this stage.


Title track Fingertip is a dance track with funky disco sounds. The track captures the attention of fans starting from the introduction and talks about a girl′s method of loving someone.


Meanwhile, GFriend released their 4th mini album The Awakening on March 6 and will actively begin promoting title track Fingertip beginning with their first comeback performance on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN on March 9.


Photo credit: Source Music
showTitle: GFriend to Perform Comeback Stage Through ′M COUNTDOWN′

newsNm: UP10TION Reaches Oricon′s ′Top 3′ With Debut Single Album
newsDesc:
Boy group UP10TION has reached Oricon′s Top 3 with their debut single album on the first day of it′s release.


On March 9, according to Japan′s top album sales chart Oricon, UP10TION′s debut single album ID reached the daily chart′s Top 3 as soon as it was released on March 8.
UP10TION, who debuted in Korea in 2015, is showing to be attracting many fans with their debut Japanese album ID and expectations are high to see their influence in Japan.


Meanwhile, k-pop boy group B1A4 also released their Japanese single album You and I on March 8 and has reached number 5 on the Oricon chart.


Photo credit: TOP Media
showTitle: UP10TION Reaches Oricon′s ′Top 3′ With Debut Single Album

newsNm: B.A.P Prepares Powerful Comeback Stage for ′M COUNTDOWN′
newsDesc:
B.A.P, who is back with their 6th single album Rose, has prepared a powerful comeback stage for M COUNTDOWN.


B.A.P received the love of many fans when they showed the choreography to new track Wake Me Up through Naver V App on March 7 and they have prepared an even more eye-catching performance for Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN.

On March 9, the boy group will perform their first comeback stage through the music program. During the broadcast, B.A.P will not only perform title track Wake Me Up, but also plans to reveal the performance for track Diamond 4 Ya.


Expectations are especially high for their first performance as B.A.P′s 6th single album Rose reached number 6 on iTunes′ Worldwide Album Chart on March 8.


Meanwhile, following their performance on Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN, B.A.P will actively promote their new title track Wake me Up through a variety of music programs. Additionally, the group also plans to hold their concert B.A.P 2017 World Tour ′PartyBaby!′ - Seoul Boom at the Bluesquare Samsung Card Hall on March 24-26.


Photo credit: TS Entertainment
showTitle: B.A.P Prepares Powerful Comeback Stage for ′M COUNTDOWN′

鐘鉉主持《藍色之夜，我是鐘鉉》3年，昨天(8日)親口宣佈「下車」消息，透露4月2日會是最後一次在空中與聽?見面，之後恐?只能在心理的空間見，震驚不少粉絲。

newsNm: 【Special】方容國歸隊 B.A.P「完整體」登今(9日)《MCD》
newsDesc:
人氣男團B.A.P回來了!隊長方容國也回來了

B.A.P日前?第六張單曲《ROSE》旋風回歸，先前因恐慌症缺席正規2輯《NOIR》打歌活動的方容國也歸隊，「完整體」讓BABY(粉絲名)都興奮不已的。

更令人期待的是，他們今天(9日)將上6點(韓國時間)直播的Mnet《M COUNTDOWN》打歌，首度表演主打歌《WAKE ME UP》和《DIAMOND 4 YA》，展現優異唱功及舞蹈。

newsNm: Highlight唱自己的歌! 梁耀燮、李起光晉升作詞作曲家
newsDesc:
從BEAST原成員組的Highlight，將於20日中午12點(韓國時間)發行迷?1輯《Can You Feel It?》，而從他們今天(9日)公開的歌單中可看出，除了龍俊亨以外，梁耀燮和李起光都參與了作詞作曲，是一張非常具有「Highlight」風格的專輯。

《Can You Feel It?》共收錄6首歌曲，包括主打歌《不要愁眉苦?》、《?美》、《開始》、《危險》、《CAN YOU FEEL IT》、《不要愁眉苦? Inst.》，其中《開始》和《危險》分別由梁耀燮、李起光包辦了作曲、?詞及編曲，龍俊亨則負責了《CAN YOU FEEL IT》的作詞工作。

Around US娛樂表示:「首張迷?專輯的主打歌《不要愁眉苦?》和知名的童謠同名，他們用會什?方式重新詮釋??敬請期待!」 照片來源:Around US娛樂 20170309/01813843.jpg

newsNm: SNSD′s Seohyun to Hold Encore Solo Concerts
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Seohyun is holding an encore solo concert next month.


Seohyun, who released her solo album Don′t Say No in January, will be holding encore solo concerts on April 8-9. The upcoming concert Love, Still Seohyun -Encore- will be an encore of Seohyun′s solo concerts held in February. Starting from tracks from her solo album Don′t Say No to hit SNSD tracks, Seohyun has prepared powerful vocal performances for the concert.


Meanwhile, ticketing for Seohyun′s encore concerts will open on March 16 through the Yes24 website.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD′s Seohyun to Hold Encore Solo Concerts

newsNm: 防彈少年團賣贏TWICE、太妍 《WINGS》系列專輯創天量

newsNm: Highlight Drops Track List Leading Up To Comeback
newsDesc:
Highlight, formerly known as BEAST, has dropped the track list for their upcoming album leading up to their comeback.


On March 9, Highlight′s agency Around US Entertainment released the track list for the group′s 1st mini album Can′t You Feel It? According to the revealed track list, Higlight′s first album as the new group will include a total of 6 tracks.


Expectations for the album are high as top producer team Good Life is credited as the writer and composer of the title track as well as multiple tracks in the album. Additionally, members Yang Yo Seop and Lee Gi Kwang are also credited in one track each.


Around US Entertainment previously confirmed Highlight as the name of the new group formed by former BEAST members Yoon Du Joon, Yong Jun Hyung, Yang Yo Seop, Lee Gi Kwang and Son Dong Woon. The members are resuming promotions 2 months after officially leaving former agency Cube Entertainment.


Meanwhile, Highlight will pre-release a track through Around US Entertainment′s official YouTube channel on March 13 and their full album Can You Feel It? will be released on March 20.


Photo credit: Around US Entertainment
showTitle: Highlight Drops Track List Leading Up To Comeback
findKywrd: BEAST, Lee Gi Kwang (Highlight), Yoon Du Jun (Highlight), Yong Jun Hyung (Highlight),

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon Tops Album, Digital Song and Download Charts
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon has proven to be a rising solo artist.


Taeyeon, who is SNSD′s main vocalist, released her 1st studio album My Voice on February 28 and reached number 1 on Gaon Chart′s Weekly Album Chart. Not only that, but Taeyeon′s title track Fine also topped the Digital Chart and Download Chart resulting in the artist reaching number 1 on a total of 3 charts.


Additionally, the album My Voice also previously reached number 1 on iTunes′ album chart and number 2 on Billboard′s World Album Chart. Taeyeon′s influence is spreading outside of Korea into other parts of the world.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon′s 1st studio album My Voice is showing to be a huge success both inside and outside of Korea.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon Tops Album, Digital Song and Download Charts

newsNm: BTS′ ′Wings′ Series Records Sales of Over 1.4 Million
newsDesc:
Male idol group BTS′ Wings series has sold over 1.4 million copies.


On March 9, according to Gaon Chart′s February Album Chart, BTS′ Wings: You Never Walk Alone sold 713,063 copies.
Previously, BTS′ 2nd studio album Wings recorded sales of 783,923 copies in October of last year. Accordingly, the combined sales of the Wings albums series has reached 1,496,986 copies sold.


Wings: You Never Walked Alone previously caught the attention of music fans when the pre-orders surpassed 700,000 copies before it′s official release.


Meanwhile, BTS will begin their tour 2017 BTS LIVE TRILOGY EPISODE III THE WINGS TOUR in Chile on March 11 and this will be followed by visits to Brazil and US cities New York, Chicago and Anaheim.


Photo credit: Big Hit Entertainment
showTitle: BTS′ ′Wings′ Series Records Sales of Over 1.4 Million

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon Wins ′M COUNTDOWN′ Trophy with ′Fine′
newsDesc:
Girl group SNSD′s Taeyeon has won the M COUNTDOWN trophy with new solo track Fine.


On the March 9 episode of Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN, Taeyeon competed against girl group Twice for the number 1 trophy. While it was Twice′s second week as a contender for the trophy with track Knock Knock, Taeyeon, who is receiving the love of many fans with track Fine, went home with the trophy.


Competition between Taeyeon and Twice was fierce as the score rose back and forth between the two. Taeyeon took the lead with fan votes, but Twice caught up with their music video views. Similarly, while Taeyeon led in album points, Twice led in song points. In the end, Taeyeon came out on top.


Meanwhile, during the M COUNTDOWN episode, Gugudan, DAY6, Lovelyz, Romeo, Brave Girls, VAV, B.A.P, BTOB, Victon, SF9, H.U.B and Hong Jin Young also performed on stage.


Photo credit: Mnet ′M COUNTDOWN′ screen capture
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon Wins ′M COUNTDOWN′ Trophy with ′Fine′

newsNm: [Video] GFriend, B.A.P and More Perform Comeback Stages on ′M COUNTDOWN′
newsDesc:
Girl group GFriend, boy group B.A.P and more have performed comeback performances through M COUNTDOWN.


On the March 9 episode of Mnet′s M COUNTDOWN, the night was full of comeback performances by GFriend, B.A.P, Brave Girls, DAY6 and BTOB. 20170310/93981695.jpgDuring their comeback stage, GFriend captured the hearts of fans with performances of title track Fingertip and track Hear The Wind Sing.


B.A.P also showed a powerful performance by revealed the first stage of title track Wake Me Up and Track Diamond 4 Ya.


Additionally, Brave Girls performed Rollin′, DAY6 performed How Can I Say and BTOB performed Movie and Someday.


Meanwhile, during the M COUNTDOWN episode, Gugudan, DAY6, Lovelyz, Romeo, Brave Girls, VAV, Twice, BTOB, Victon, SF9, H.U.B and Hong Jin Young also performed on stage.








Photo credit: Mnet ′M COUNTDOWN′ screen capture
showTitle: [Video] GFriend, B.A.P and More Perform Comeback Stages on ′M COUNTDOWN′

newsNm: Big Bang′s G-Dragon Shares Photo of Group Members
newsDesc:
Top male idol group Big Bang′s G-Dragon has shared a photo of his fellow group members.


On March 9, G-Dragon shared a photo of Big Bang members through his personal Instagram with the message, "Cuties." In the revealed image, Big Bang′s Taeyang, Seungri and Daesung are seen sitting around a table and looking at the camera. Member T.O.P is missing from the photo as he is currently serving his mandatory military service.


Meanwhile, Big Bang released their last album MADE before T.O.P′s military enlistment in December and completed final group promotions earlier this year. During T.O.P′s enlistment, the group will be promoting through solo activities.


Photo credit: G-Dragon Instagram
showTitle: Big Bang′s G-Dragon Shares Photo of Group Members

newsNm: IU to Make Comeback with Studio Album in April
newsDesc:
Artist IU is making a comeback with a new studio album.


On March 9, a representative from IU′s agency LOEN Entertainment shared, "IU will release her 4th studio album in April and make a comeback." According to the agency, IU is busy making final preparations on the album. Expectations are especially rising as IU shared plans to pre-release a track on March 24.


The upcoming album with mark IU′s first album in 1 year and 6 months. Her last release was Chat-Shire, which was released in October 2015. IU is especially attracting attention for her upcoming album as it comes after her recent break up with artist Jang Kiha.


Meanwhile, recently, IU rose the expectations of her return by sharing through her official fan website, "I wasn′t resting until now, I was working hard under water."


Photo credit: IU Instagram
showTitle: IU to Make Comeback with Studio Album in April

newsNm: [Video] GOT7 Drops Teaser Video for ′Never Ever′
newsDesc:
Boy group GOT7 has dropped the teaser video for upcoming track Never Ever.


On March 10, GOT7′s agency JYP Entertainment released a 30 second long teaser video for Never Ever through their official SNS channels. In the revealed teaser, a portion of Never Ever is heard while shorts clips featuring each member catch the attention of fans. The revealed lyrics read, "You wanted a long time. I′m so sorry. I have now decided. Are you ready."


GOT7 began their Flight Log series with the release of Flight Log: Departure in March 2016. They met fans through the 2nd part of the series Flight Log: Turbulence in September 2016 and will now be continuing the series with Flight Log: Arrival, which is set to release on March 13.


Meanwhile, GOT7 will hold their comeback showcase GOT7 The First Stage on March 13 and officially began promotions with their new album Flight Log: Arrival.





Photo credit: GOT7 ′Never Ever′ teaser screen capture
showTitle: [Video] GOT7 Drops Teaser Video for ′Never Ever′

newsNm: EXO′s Lay Unable to Attend Upcoming Tour Dates
newsDesc:
EXO member Lay is unable to attend upcoming tour dates with EXO.


On March 8, Dream Maker Entertainment Limited, who is producing EXO′s tour, revealed through Facebook, "Lay is not attending EXO′s remaining tour concerts abroad." The production company did not go into detail regarding the reason for his absence but shared, "Lay is regretfully unable to attend as he was unable to adjust his schedule."


Accordingly, EXO′s 8 members will perform for future concerts in this tour. The representative added, "The remaining tour dates will include 8 members without Lay. We would like to apologize to all those who looked forward to Lay′s appearance."


Meanwhile, EXO is currently holding their 3rd solo concert tour EXO PLANET #3 - The EXO’rDIUM and meeting with fans from all over the world. So far, the group has toured Korea, Japan, Hong Kong and the Philippines and will be traveling to Malaysia on March 18.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: EXO′s Lay Unable to Attend Upcoming Tour Dates

newsNm: Girl′s Day Finally Confirms Comeback Date
newsDesc:
Girl group Girl′s Day has finally confirmed their comeback date.


On March 10, Girl′s Day′s agency Dream Tea Entertainment shared news of their comeback by stating, "Girl′s Day is releasing a new track on March 27. The genre is a dance track." A representative of the agency also shared, "The music video for the new track will be filmed on March 12-13."


Accordingly, Girl′s Day will make a comeback as a whole group after a 2 year hiatus. After releasing their 2nd studio album Love in July 2015,the members have been busy with individual activities. As much as they are making a comeback after a long time, fans have high expectations for their new release.


Photo credit: Dream Tea Entertainment
showTitle: Girl′s Day Finally Confirms Comeback Date

newsNm: 張藝興忙到缺席世巡 EXO-L要崩潰了
newsDesc:
天團EXO的中國籍成員Lay(張藝興)將不參加′EXO PLANET #3 - The EXO′rDIUM′接下來的場次!

EXO自去年7月起展開世界巡?演唱會′EXO PLANET #3 - The EXO′rDIUM′，演唱會企劃公司Dreammaker於8日宣佈:「Lay因行程無法配合，不得不缺席之後的海外巡演，由其?8名成員負責完成表演。」

Lay缺席的場次包括3月18日吉隆坡、4月2日新加坡、4月25日美國紐華克、4月27日墨西哥、4月28日美國洛杉磯，粉絲接獲消息後無不感到失望，留言:「我?的?想見Lay」、「我要Lay!!!」、「什??我已經準備好要見他的說」、「好難過」。 照片來源:SM娛樂
showTitle: 張藝興忙到缺席世巡 EXO-L要崩潰了

newsNm: [Video] Highlight Raises Expectations for Return with ′It′s Still Beautiful′ Teaser
newsDesc:
Hightlight, formerly known as BEAST, has released a teaser video for the track It′s Still Beautiful.


On March 10, Highlight′s agency Around US entertainment released the teaser video for track It′s Still Beautiful of their upcoming album Can You Feel It?. The track is set to be pre-released before the official release of the full album.
A representative of the agency shared, "The simple but strong piano sounds are accompanied with the lyrics, ′Those times I spent with you, all of it was beautiful.′"


Meanwhile, Highlight will be pre-releasing It′s Still Beautiful on March 13. Expectations for the album are high as top producer team Good Life is credited as the writer and composer of the title track as well as multiple tracks in the album. Additionally, members Yang Yo Seop and Lee Gi Kwang are also credited in one track each.


Highlight′s full album Can You Feel It will be released on March 20.





Photo credit: Around US Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Highlight Raises Expectations for Return with ′It′s Still Beautiful′ Teaser
findKywrd: BEAST, Lee Gi Kwang (Highlight), Yoon Du Jun (Highlight), Yong Jun Hyung (Highlight), Yang Yo Seop (Highlight), Son Dong Woon (Highlight), Highlight

newsDesc:
Mnet《少年24(BOYS24)》選拔出的9名少年組成首個出道男團，將進行一連串的宣傳活動，不過網上近日?傳少年陳成鎬曾是校園暴力的加害人，相關人員今天(10日)表示他自願退出團體。

《少年24》的首個出道男團由陳成鎬、金成賢、金容炫、朴塗荷、吳振碩、劉榮斗、鄭然太、黃仁虎和韓顯旭組成，陳成鎬5日曾表示:「謝謝H:Our讓我們爬上今天的位子，少年成鎬未來也不會讓大家失望。」

《少年24》的首個出道男團原定將發行單曲，?展開3個月的宣傳活動，少年陳成鎬退出之後，計劃可能有所改變。 20170310/37488219.jpg照片來源:Mnet、CJ E&M Music

newsNm: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ Reaches Number 1 for 3rd Week in a Row
newsDesc:
Twice′s new track Knock Knock has reached number 1 on Genie′s Weekly Chart for a third week in a row.


In addition to reaching number 1 on Genie′s Weekly Chart for a third week, Twice also remained number 1 on Genie′s Real Time Chart for 243 hours immediately after it′s release. Following Twice on the Weekly Chart was SNSD′s Taeyeon with her solo title track Fine. Taeyeon′s new track Fine topped Genie′s Real Time Chart at number 1 for 66 hours after it was released.


Additionally, girl group GFriend was listed at number 3 with their new title track Fingertip and boy group BTOB was listed at number 4 with new track Movie.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice′s ′Knock Knock′ Reaches Number 1 for 3rd Week in a Row

newsNm: 【Special】GFRIEND出道即爆紅 Buddy遍佈美洲、歐洲
newsDesc:
2015年1月以《Glass Bead》出道的GFRIEND，素媛（21歲）、睿隣（20歲）、銀河（19歲）、裕株（19歲）、信飛（18歲）、嚴智（18歲）不知不覺成?家?戶曉的偶像，甚至紅到了美洲和歐洲! GFRIEND唱紅每一張迷?專輯的主打歌，一連以《Glass Bead》、《Me Gustas Tu》、《Rough》、《Navillera》和《Fingertip》?得歌迷歡心，與大型經紀公司出身的TWICE、Red Velvet和BLACKPINK?列大勢女團。

不只在韓國國內，在海外也紅?天，素媛透露:「我們曾經到美國參加活動，去遊樂園玩還被外國人認出來，外國粉絲在遠處叫GFRIEND，那讓我們覺得?驚訝，謝謝他們這?關注我們。」

睿隣補充說:「有些店家不只放主打歌，連收錄曲都放了，太感激大家了。」

而不只在美國，GFRIEND到歐洲錄SkyTV《GFRIEND所愛的歐洲》時，走在路上也被外國粉絲認出，可見其名氣程度。 20170310/11312704.jpg20170310/11312706.jpg照片來源:Source Music 此外，附GFRIEND親簽的迷?4輯《The Awakening》在Mwave商城銷?中，女孩們將於3月上Mwave《MEET&GREET》與海外歌迷隔空互動。
showTitle: 【Special】GFRIEND出道即爆紅 Buddy遍佈美洲、歐洲

newsNm: 【Special】偶像團體的宿命? GFRIEND空白期才能睡飽
newsDesc:
舞蹈整齊到像複製貼上的女團GFRIEND，自2015年1月出道以來就勤勞的像牛，每半年必推出新歌，迷?4輯《The Awakening》是唯一一張間隔了8個月發行的專輯，成員們透露休息期間睡了不少覺! 信飛說:「空白期期間做了?多因忙碌而沒做的個人練習。先前幾乎沒有個人時間，沒發片的日子?成員一起去看電影、購物，也補了?多眠。那段時間做了?多沒做過的事，感到相當幸福。」

素媛大笑說:「好像睡了?多覺。」、「我是大學生，但其實沒能常去學校上學。利用空?去見同學，加上我是演技學系的學生，?公司說了我想去上演?課。公司通常都會答應我們的要求，?高興能做喜歡的事。」

睿隣也不例外，?說:「?開心可以想睡就睡。?了加?歌唱功力，我有做練習。」

此外，附GFRIEND親簽的迷?4輯《The Awakening》在Mwave商城銷?中，女孩們將於3月上Mwave《MEET&GREET》與海外歌迷隔空互動。

照片來源:Source Music
showTitle: 【Special】偶像團體的宿命? GFRIEND空白期才能睡飽

newsNm: CNBLUE Drops Promotion Schedule for ′7℃N′
newsDesc:
Boy band CNBLUE has dropped the schedule poster for their upcoming comeback.


On March 10, CNBLUE′s agency FNC Entertainment released the promotion schedule for the group′s upcoming 7th mini album 7℃N through their official SNS channels. CNBLUE will lead up to their combeack by opening the teaser website on March 13. This is be followed by sharing the album launching film, album title poster, teaser images, music video trailer, highligh medley and finally, band performance trailer.


Additionally, on March 20, CNBLUE will officially drop their 7th mini album 7℃N and music video through a variety of music websites.


Meanwhile, CNBLUE′s 7th mini album 7℃N is releasing on the same year as CNBLUE′s 7th year since debuting.


Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: CNBLUE Drops Promotion Schedule for ′7℃N′

newsNm: Lee Hyori Gives Update on Album Release Date
newsDesc:
Artist Lee Hyori has updated fans regarding her comeback date.


On March 10, Lee Hyori′s agency Kwi Media shared, "Lee Hyori is looking into making a comeback in late May or later." It has been revealed that composer Kim Do Hyun, who worked with Lee Hyori on her hit track 10 Minutes, and Kiwi Media′s Kim Hyung Suk will be producing Lee Hyori′s album.


Additionally, Lee Hyori has personally been involved in writing and composing most of the tracks in her upcoming album.


Leading up to her comeback, Lee Hyori has been active in appearing in a variety of fashion magazines including Marie Claire. Lee Hyori, who has lived a private life since her marriage to Lee Sang Soon, is raising expectations for her return through these activities.


Photo credit: Marie Claire
showTitle: Lee Hyori Gives Update on Album Release Date

newsNm: Eric Nam Shares Cute Selfie Video with Jeon So Mi
newsDesc:
Eric Nam and former I.O.I member Jeon So Mi have appeared in a cute video.


On March 9, Eric Nam shared a short video through his personal Instagram featuring himself and Jeon So Mi.In the revealed video, Eric Nam is posing with Jeon So Mi, who collaborated with the artist in his first track You, Who? of his collaboration project Spring Note. The pair have transformed into cute cats through a phone application and are seen smiling into the camera.


Along with the video, Eric Nam also tagged Jeon So mi and shared the message, "You, Who?"


Meanwhile, Eric Nam and Jeon So Mi′s collaboration track Who, You? was officially released on March 9.


Photo credit: Eric Instagram
showTitle: Eric Nam Shares Cute Selfie Video with Jeon So Mi

newsDesc:
SNSD members have gathered together to celebrate Taeyeon′s birthday.


On March 9, member Seohyun shared a video through her personal Instagram with the message, "Happy Birthday Taengoo Unni~Happy Birthday~to~you~ Happy Birthday~to~you~ Happy Birthday~to~Taeyeon Unni~ Happy Birthday~to~you~" In the revealed image, Taeyeon is seen surrounded by SNSD members Seohyun, Sooyoung and Tiffany. Illustrations of party decorations, a cake and a crown are seen drawn around the photo.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon released her 1st solo studio album My Voice on February 28 and has gaining the love of fans with her title track Fine.


Photo credit: Seohyun Instagram
showTitle: SNSD Members Gather to Celebrate Taeyeon′s Birthday

newsNm: GOT7′s Jackson to Take Break Due to Health Issues
newsDesc:
GOT7′s Jackson is taking a break from actitivies due to his health. On March 12, Jackson′s agency JYP Entertainment revealed, "Jackson′s health suddenly worsened while attending GOT7′s fan meeting on March 11. We decided it was difficult to continue and he was unable to attend the last segment, Hi-touch."


Previously, it was revealed that Jackson was absent during the last segment during GOT7′s fan meeting on March 11.


The agency continued, "Currently, he is taking a break and focusing on his recovery and taking care of himself."


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: GOT7′s Jackson to Take Break Due to Health Issues

newsNm: Former H.O.T Member Lee Jae Won to Resume Activities
newsDesc:
Former H.O.T member Lee Jae Won is resuming activities.


On March 12, Lee Jae Won shared a photo posing with Tony An on his personal Instagram with the message, "Yesterday, I spoke to hyung about a variety of things for the first time in a while. Truthfully, I′ve been thinking a lot about about work. It′s a difficult time because I rested for a long time, but hyung says that he would help." In the photo, Lee Jae Won is seen posing with fellow H.O.T member Tony An.


Lee Jae Won continued, "Please support me through my opportunities in broadcast and slowly beginning actitivies. If you see me on TV beginning next month, it′s Tony hyung who made it happen."


Meanwhile, Lee Jae Won debuted through H.O.T in 1996. After the group disbanded, Lee Jae Won returned in the group JTL with Jang Woo Hyuk and Tony An. Since then, he was active as a solo artist and also appeared in a musical in 2015.


Photo credit: Lee Jae Won Instagram
showTitle: Former H.O.T Member Lee Jae Won to Resume Activities
findKywrd: Tony An, Kim Jae Won, H.O.T.

newsNm: SNSD′s Taeyeon Featured in ′High Cut′ Photo Spread
newsDesc:
SNSD′s Taeyeon has been featured in a photo spread in High Cut.


Taeyeon, who made a comebace with her 1st solo studio album My Voice, modeled for a shoe brand through High Cut. In the revealed spread, Taeyeon is seen wearing a simple long knit dress while wearing black sneakers. Her hair is styled short with waves and the artist gazes into the camera.


Meanwhile, Taeyeon topped charts as soon as she released her solo album My Voice. She is currently receiving the love of many fans with title track Fine.


Photo credit: High Cut
showTitle: SNSD′s Taeyeon Featured in ′High Cut′ Photo Spread

newsNm: Oh My Girl′s JinE Unable to Join Comeback Due to Anorexia
newsDesc:
Oh My Girl, who is set to make a comeback in April, is preparing to make a comeback as 7 members.


Member JinE will continue focusing on her health and will not be participating in activities.
On March 13, Oh My Girl′s agency WM Entertainment shared through the group′s official fan website, "JinE will not be participating in Oh My Girl′s new album."


Previously, JinE took a break from activities in late August 2016 due to her anorexia. At the time, it was revealed that after long discussions, they came to the conclusion that JinE′s health came first and decided that she would take a temporary break.


Meanwhile, fans will meet the remaining 7 members of Oh My Girl through their comeback in April.


Photo credit: WM Entertainment
showTitle: Oh My Girl′s JinE Unable to Join Comeback Due to Anorexia

newsNm: Twice Shows Appreciation to Fans After Completing Promotions with ′Knock Knock′
newsDesc:
Twice, who completed promotions with Knock Knock, has shown their appreciation to their fans.


On March 13, girl group Twice, shared a group photo their their official Twitter account. The photo comes after the group′s last performance with track Knock Knock on Inkigayo on March 12. Twice′s shared, "It seems like yesterday that we knocked on Once′s hearts with ′Knock Knock′ on February 20, but 3 weeks have already passed. Thank you for allowing us to win 1st place today with our last performance with this album. We had a joyful 3 weeks thanks to Once."


Meanwhile, Twice performed their last stage with Knock Knock through SBS′ Inkigayo on March 12.


Photo credit: Twice Twitter
showTitle: Twice Shows Appreciation to Fans After Completing Promotions with ′Knock Knock′

newsNm: [Video] CNBLUE Raises Expectations for Comeback With Launching Films
newsDesc:
CNBLUE has risen the expectations for their comeback by releasing a series of launching films.


On March 13, CNBLUE released launching films featuring each member for their upcoming new album 7℃N. The films were produced under two themes, "ON" and "OFF." In each film, the members are seen holding a cellphone against their ear or about to call someone. The camera reveals the emotions of the members by either zooming into the member or away from them.


A representative of their agency FNC Entertainment shared, "The new album ′7℃N′ holds the emotions of CNBLUE who are approaching the 7th year of their debut this year."


Meanwhile, CNBLUE′s new album 7℃N will be release on March 20.





Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] CNBLUE Raises Expectations for Comeback With Launching Films

newsDesc:
Mnet《PRODUCE 101》第二季的製作單位自10日下午6點(韓國時間)起，一天曝光一組練習生的姓名、所屬經紀公司和個人照，至今已曝光三組，引起熱烈討論。

《PRODUCE 101》第二季以男練習生?主，來自各大經紀公司的101名練習生將透過節目爭取出道機會，規則與女版相同，出道的決定權握在觀?的手上。

newsNm: Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun′s ′Newlywed Diary′ Comes to an End
newsDesc:
Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun′s Newlywed Diary has come to a warm end.


On March 10, tvN′s Newlywed Diary, which documented the lives of newlyweds Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun, came to a warm ending by showing behind the scenes footage of the couple. Newlywed Diary began on February 3 and the program followed the newly married couple at their home located in the Gangwon province. Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun and their 6 pets captured the hearts of viewers throughout the last few weeks.


The couple were able to successfully gain the love of fans as the program featured a real couple in their early stages of marriage. They did not hide their appreciation for each other and were seen encouraging one another throughout the series.


Additionally, the program also attracted the attention of fans as it broke the standards of gender roles. Ku Hye Sun was seen waking up early to start the fire and showed her carefree personality. On the other hand, Ahn Jae Hyeon was seen grocery shopping and cooking dishes for his wife.


Finally, the stars of the show were the couple′s 6 pets. Each of the animals stole the show with their unique personalities and viewers were able to see Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun′s adorable relationship with their pets.


Meanwhile, Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun confirmed dating rumors in March 2016 and officially wed through a private ceremony in May of the same year.


Photo credit: tvN
showTitle: Ahn Jae Hyeon and Ku Hye Sun′s ′Newlywed Diary′ Comes to an End
findKywrd: Ku Hye Sun, Ahn Jae Hyeon

newsNm: 【Special】《新婚日記》安宰賢、具惠善不止放閃 還教夫妻相處之道
newsDesc:
製作人羅?錫捧紅了許多藝人，讓李瑞?、車勝元等人名聲大增，近日他一手企劃的tvN《新婚日記》一樣大受歡迎，安宰賢、具惠善的新婚生活曝光，滿足粉絲的好奇心。

去年5月21日結婚的安宰賢和具惠善，以家庭聚會取代婚禮，省下來的費用捐贈給醫院的兒科病房，好感度瞬間爆增。

《新婚日記》10日以3.2%的收視率播畢，網路討論度破表，而這節目究竟有什?魅力?? 1、鼓勵結婚
安宰賢和具惠善在節目上大秀恩愛，放下洗碗工作打??球、交換愛的眼神，增加了未婚夫妻對婚姻的期待。兩人不吝稱讚對方，也?得戶相體諒，安宰賢享用具惠善做的飯前，總是會說:「謝謝?!老婆!」?使具惠善一頭亂髮，他也稱讚:「老婆，?好美。」，?蜜不在話下，

2、?正的夫妻
安宰賢和具惠善和其?夫妻一樣，會因分擔家務的問題起紛爭，引起不少人的同感。具惠善透露了因家務所?生的壓力，安宰賢表示自己有在?忙，?難過付出的努力被否認。兩人透過對話溝通，彼此體諒，令人讚嘆。

3、打破性別偏見
具惠善擅長釘釘子、揮??土等，早起燒暖爐的火，展現大剌剌大剌剌的個性。安宰賢勤儉持家，也?擅長料理，反轉外界對男人的印象。

4、寵物
安宰賢和具惠善養有馬鈴薯、炒栗子和血腸三隻寵物犬、下酒菜、芒果、包飯三隻寵物?，每個動物都擁有各自的個性，可愛惹人愛，?住了所有人的目光。
