showTitle: 【Special】《新婚日記》安宰賢、具惠善不止放閃 還教夫妻相處之道

newsNm: Produce 101 Reveals Lineup for Second Season
newsDesc:
Mnet′s Produce 101, which is returning for a second season, has revealed the lineup for their 101 trainees.


Beginning on March 10, Mnet′s Produce 101 Season 2 has been revealing the lineup of their 101 trainees and showing the profiles and short videos for each member.
Produce 101 Season 2, which will air beginning April 7, will gather 101 male trainees from agencies around Korea. The viewers will become producers to help select the final members to debut as a boy group.


On March 9, the members of Produce 101 Season 2 appeared in front of fans through their performance of track Pick Me on M COUNTDOWN. The video for their special performance gained 1 million views within one day.


Meanwhile, Produce 101 Season 2 will begin airing on April 7 at 11PM KST, replacing High School Rapper.


Photo credit: Mnet
showTitle: Produce 101 Reveals Lineup for Second Season

newsNm: Girl′s Day Confirms Appearance on ′Knowing Bros′ Leading up to Comeback
newsDesc:
Girl group Girl′s Day has confirmed their appearance in JTBC′s Knowing Bros.


Leading up to their comeback, Girl′s Day will be making an appearance in variety program Knowing Bros. On March 13, a representative from Girl′s Day′s agency Dream T Entertainment shared, "Girl′s Day will be appearing in JTBC′s ′Knowing Bros′ and ′Let′s Eat Dinner Together.′"


Meanwhile, Girl′s Day will be releasing their first album in 2 years since releasing their 2nd studio album Love in July 2015. Their new album is set to release on March 27.


Photo credit: Dream T Entertainment
showTitle: Girl′s Day Confirms Appearance on ′Knowing Bros′ Leading up to Comeback

newsNm: Apink′s Jung Eun Ji to Make Solo Comeback
newsDesc:
Girl group Apink′s Jung Eun Ji is making a solo comeback.


On March 13, a representative of Apink′s agency Plan A Entertainment shared, "Jung Eun Ji is preparing a solo album with a goal of making a comeback in April." Jung Eun Ji successfully made her solo debut by releasing her mini album Dream in April 2016. Title track Hopefully, which Jung Eun Ji personally helped compose and write, topped music charts as soon as it was released. It has been revealed that Jung Eun Ji will be equally as involved in the production of her upcoming album.


Meanwhile, Apink members are currently busy with individual activities. A representative stated, "First we will release Jung Eun Ji′s solo album and produce Apink′s group album afterwards."


Photo credit: Plan A Entertainment
showTitle: Apink′s Jung Eun Ji to Make Solo Comeback
findKywrd: A Pink, Jung Eun Ji (A Pink)

newsNm: JYP Entertainment Denies Dating Rumors Between GOT7′s Bam Bam and Twice′s Mina
newsDesc:
JYP Entertainment has denied dating rumors between GOT7′s Bam Bam and Twice′s Mina.


On March 13, after a photo surfaced of Bam Bam and Mina posing together, their agency JYP Entertainment stated, "It was a photo taken without thought. The pair are simply colleagues in the same company." The agency continued, "We will strictly deal with matters that undermine the reputation of artists in this regard."


Before JYP Entertainment released their statement, a photo of Mina and Bam Bam lying down while taking a photo together was leaking online. Many speculated that the image was photoshopped, but it has since been revealed the photo is real and the pair took the photo as friends.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: JYP Entertainment Denies Dating Rumors Between GOT7′s Bam Bam and Twice′s Mina

newsNm: 【影片】辛苦誰人知！ 《PRODUCE 101》參賽者受傷再爬起來跳
newsDesc:
Mnet選秀節目《PRODUCE 101》去年開播，11名優勝女孩組成I.O.I活動一年，在韓國歌壇?起一股炫風。

節目將於4月7日播出第2季，改推男團，來自不同經紀公司的101名參賽者在上週四播出的Mnet《M COUNTDOWN》首亮相，在大型的移動舞台上表演《PICK ME》，影片在平台NAVER TV上線後，播放次數已突破150萬，不少參賽者更火速有了粉絲團。

節目上，101人在舞台移動的同時照樣勁歌熱舞，場面壯觀，不過傳出錄影時有1名參賽者?下舞台縫隙受傷，引發粉絲關切。

Mnet《PRODUCE 101》第2季的製作單位表示，該名參賽者沒有傷的?重，治療後重回舞台，?順利地完成了錄影。 一起來欣賞男版《PICK ME》!

newsNm: TWICE、GOT7外籍成員傳爆愛火 JYP氣憤地警告網友
newsDesc:
TWICE日籍成員Mina（19歲）和GOT7泰籍成員BamBam（19歲）傳出戀情，JYP娛樂出面否認，指兩人只是?單純的同事關係。

網路最近?傳一張「BamBam、Mina戀情外洩」的?蜜照片，JYP娛樂今天(13日)解釋:「只是一張零距離感的照片，他們是?單純的同事關係。」?發表?硬立場表明:「如果網路上再有破壞藝人聲譽的流言傳出，不排除採取行動。」。

看到照片的網友留言:「不管是?是假，身?粉絲就應該要支持。」、「到底是誰曝光照片的?」、「純友誼也能拍這樣的照片?!」。

此外，TWICE昨剛結束新歌《KNOCK KNOCK》宣傳，接下來將準備4月的巡?演唱會《TWICELAND - The Opening -》曼谷場、新加坡場演出，6月底也將進軍日本出道。GOT7則於今天發行迷?專輯《FLIGHT LOG : ARRIVAL》。 照片來源:網路論壇

newsNm: Former 2NE1 Member CL Updates Fans on New Album
newsDesc:
Former 2NE1 member CL has updated fans on her new album.


On March 13, CL shared a short video through her personal Instagram.In the revealed video, CL is seen in what looks like a recording studio. She has her back against the camera as she looks from side to front.


In addition to the video, CL also shared the message, "+Your internet mom is aliveee happy, healthy , and working very hard for her internet kidzzz+"


Meanwhile, CL′s group 2NE1 officially disbanded in November 2016 and released their last track Goodbye in January 2017. After the group′s disbandment, members CL and Sandara Park signed solo contracts with YG Entertainment.


Photo credit: CL Instagram
showTitle: Former 2NE1 Member CL Updates Fans on New Album

newsNm: M.A.P.6 to Make Comeback in Japan With ′No Surrender′
newsDesc:
Boy group M.A.P.6 is making a comeback in Japan.


On March 13, M.A.P.6′s agency Dream T Entertainment revealed, "On March 15, M.A.P.6′s 2nd album ′No Surrender′ will be released." Title track No Surrender is a powerful track about new beginnings. Expectations are especially high as composer Amon, who has worked with groups EXO, SHINee, B.A.P, BTOB and Japanese group EXILE, helped write and compose the title track.


Additionally, M.A.P.6 has also risen expectations for their return by releasing a series of photos showing off their matured look.


Meanwhile, M.A.P.6 had previously gained the love of Japanese fans as soon as they debuted in Japan in August 2016. Their track Swagger Time Japanese Version reached number 1 on Shibuya′s Tower Records′ daily chart and reached number 7 on Oricon′s daily chart.


Photo credit: Dream T Entertainment
showTitle: M.A.P.6 to Make Comeback in Japan With ′No Surrender′

newsDesc:
今天(13日)是ZE:A前成員光熙（28歲）入伍的大日子，不過MBC《無限挑戰》和ZE:A前隊友皆未到場。

光熙在今天下午獨自現身論山訓練所，大方以平頭裝示人，又做出敬禮手勢，簡單地向在場送行的粉絲及媒體打招呼：「謝謝大家，會健健康康，好去好回的，不要忘記我?！」被問到《無限挑戰》成員未有前來送行，光熙大方表示：「已經全部聯絡過了，所以沒關係。」

newsNm: BTS Surpasses 100 Million Views on Fourth Music Video
newsDesc:
Boy group BTS has surpassed 100 million views on a fourth music video.


On March 14, BTS′ agency Big Hit Entertainment revealed that the music video for title track Boy In Luv of the group′s 2nd mini album Skool Luv Affair, which was released in February 2014, passed 100 million views on the evening of March 13.

Accordingly, BTS has received over 100 million views on four music videos including DOPE, FIRE, Blood Sweat & Tears and most recently Boy In Luv.


Boy In Luv is a hip hop track with strong rock beats. It is a song about a boy confessing his love.


Meanwhile, BTS is currently touring South and North America with their WINGS Tour visiting cities including Santiago, Chile; Sao Paulo, Brazil; and New York, Chicago and Anaheim in the US.


Photo credit:
showTitle: BTS Surpasses 100 Million Views on Fourth Music Video

newsNm: Twice′s Jihyo to Take Break From Activities Due to Knee Pain
newsDesc:
Girl group Twice′s Jihyo is taking a break from activities due to knee pain.


According to Twice′s agency JYP Entertainment, Jihyo will be taking a break after it was revealed that she is suffering from a knee injury. The agency shared, "Jihyo received a detailed examination at the hospital after experiencing knee pain recently. The hospital found something wrong with her knee, so we are taking the necessary medical measures and she is recovering."


They continued, "She plans to take a break from schedules to ensure a quick and safe recovery. We ask fans to understand as the decision was made with her health in mind."


Recently, Twice has been receiving the love of fans with new title track Knock Knock of their special album, which was released on February 20.


Meanwhile, it was previously revealed that Jackson of GOT7, who is also part of JYP Entertainment, will be taking a break due to health issues as well.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: Twice′s Jihyo to Take Break From Activities Due to Knee Pain

newsNm: [Video] Highlight Tops Music Charts with ′It′s Still Beautiful′
newsDesc:
Boy group Highlight, formerly known as BEAST, has topped music charts in the midst of many other artist comebacks.


As of March 14 at 7AM KST, Highlight′s new track It′s Still Beautiful topped the real-time charts of Genie, Soribada, Olleh Music and Bugs. After leaving their company Cube Entertainment and changing their group name from BEAST to Highlight, the group returned with new track It′s Still Beautiful on March 13. Although it is a new beginning for Highlight, the music charts showed that their popularity has not died down.


It′s Still Beautiful is the pre-released track of Highlight′s upcoming debut album Can You Feel It? The track is an emotional ballad produced by team Good Life.


Meanwhile, Highlight′s full album Can You Feel It? will be released on March 20.





Photo credit: Around US Entertainment
showTitle: [Video] Highlight Tops Music Charts with ′It′s Still Beautiful′
findKywrd: Highlight Son Dong Woon (Highlight) Yang Yo Seop (Highlight) Yong Jun Hyung (Highlight) Yoon Du Jun (Highlight) Lee Gi Kwang (Highlight)

newsNm: CNBLUE Releases Album Images for Upcoming Release
newsDesc:
CNBLUE has released album images for their upcoming release.


On March 14, CNBLUE′s agency FNC Entertainment released album images for their 7th mini album 7℃N through their official teaser website. In the revealed images, the members of CNBLUE are seen posing on a beach while wearing white and black attire. In addition to a group image, individual images featuring each member was also released.


CNBLUE plans to release their 7th mini album 7℃N on March 20 and will actively promote title track Between Us. Between Us talks about the complicated relationship between a boy and a girl before they become a couple.


Meanwhile, CNBLUE, who is awaiting their comeback, will also release the track list for their 7th album 7℃N on March 14.


Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: CNBLUE Releases Album Images for Upcoming Release

newsNm: YG開「冷凍庫」！ WINNER4月初終於要解凍了
newsDesc:
韓國男團WINNER由李昇勳、金秦禹、宋旻浩、姜昇潤所組成，不但1年2個月未發片，南太鉉去年11月還因心理疾病退團，讓許多粉絲相當焦急，今天(14日)適逢西洋情人節，YG娛樂宣告他們4月初回歸的好消息，對粉絲來說無疑是最棒的禮物。

韓媒先前報導WINNER將於4月1日發片，YG娛樂表示:「WINNER計?於4月初回歸，日期還在協調當中。」

YG娛樂被網友?稱是「冷凍庫」，旗下團體的空白期比其他經紀公司都長，WINNER這次事隔1年2個月回歸，iKON至今已10個月未發新歌。

照片來源:李昇勳 Instagram

newsNm: Former Wonder Girls Member Sunmi to Join Same Agency as Urban Zakapa
newsDesc:
Girl group Wonder Girls′ former member Sunmi is joining the same agency as Urban Zakapa, MakeUs Entertainment.


On March 14, MakeUs Entertainment revealed, "We signed an exclusive contract with Sunmi at the end of last month." They continued, "We will not hold back any support for Sunmi′s musical ventures. We will provide a musical environment so that she can set a position as a musician."


Sunmi also shared, "I will show you a new side of myself through a new company and through seriously thinking about my future musicial activities. I want to thank my fans and friends and my previous company for showing me your love."


Meanwhile, Sunmi′s previous group Wonder Girls disbanded in January 2017 after 10 years together. Yeeun and Sunmi have left the agency JYP Entertainment.


Photo credit: Sunmi Instagram
showTitle: Former Wonder Girls Member Sunmi to Join Same Agency as Urban Zakapa

newsNm: GOT7 Gathers 2,000 Fans for ′Flight Log: Arrival′ Showcase
newsDesc:
GOT7 has gather 2,000 fans for their Flight Log: Arrival showcase.


On March 13, GOT7 held the showcase GOT7 ′Flight Log: Arrival′ The First Stage at Coex Mall in Seoul, Korea. 2,000 fans gathered at the event, which was held to commemorate the release of GOT7′s new mini album Flight Log: Arrival.


During the event, GOT7 performed tracks Fly, Skyway and Hard Carry and also performed tracks from the new album including Sign, Q and title track Never Ever for the first time on stage.


While meeting the fans, GOT7 shared, "We are so happy to be with the fans. We can feel your energy." The group also talked about Jackson, who was unable to attend the event due to his health, by stating, "Cheer for him as he is quickly recovering."


Meanwhile, as of March 14 at 12PM KST, the music video for title track Never Ever has already surpassed 4 million views.


Photo credit: JYP Entertainment
showTitle: GOT7 Gathers 2,000 Fans for ′Flight Log: Arrival′ Showcase

newsNm: f(x)′s Amber Expresses Dissatisfaction With Agency
newsDesc:
Girl group f(x) member Amber has expressed her dissatisfaction with her agency. The agency SM Entertainment has not released a statement regarding the issue.


On March 14, Amber posted a black image on her personal Instagram with a message sharing her frustrations with the agency.Through the message, Amber wrote, "I′ve given my everything. I tried to work things out. Whether it be the creative or business, I’ve been doing everything myself for years so I can to keep myself afloat. But in the end, I’m continuously neglected, hurt, and taken advantage of. I’ve been patient… the fans have been extremely patient and I can’t take it anymore just sitting around, waiting, being constantly rejected and given false hope. I’m so tired mentally and physically and this is where I draw the line. No more."


SM Entertainment has not responded to Amber′s message.


Meanwhile, Amber′s group f(x) has been inactive since promoting their album 4 Walls in October 2015.


Photo credit: Amber Instagram
showTitle: f(x)′s Amber Expresses Dissatisfaction With Agency

newsNm: Girl′s Day Releases Still Cut From Music Video Shoot
newsDesc:
Girl′s Day, who is awaiting their comeback, has release a still cut from their music video shoot.


On March 14, Girl′s Day released a photo from their recent music video shoot through their official SNS channels. In the revealed image, the 4 members of Girl′s Day are seen wearing silver sequin attire while gazing into the camera. Their new hairstyles and confident poses especially caught the eyes of fans.


Girl′s Day, who are returning after 1 year and 9 months, shared, "We are happy to have come back together as a whole group after 1 year and 9 months to shoot the music video. And we are looking forward to and am extremely nervous thinking about meeting the fans for the first time in a while. As much as you have waited, we will return the favor with our promotions."


Meanwhile, Girl′s Day′s 5th mini album will be released on March 27.


Photo credit: Dream T Entertainment
showTitle: Girl′s Day Releases Still Cut From Music Video Shoot

newsNm: WINNER to Return as Four Member Group
newsDesc:
WINNER, who became a 4 member group after the departure of member Nam Tae Hyun, is set to make a comeback.


On March 14, a representative of WINNER′s agency YG Entertainment shared, "WINNER is preparing with a goal of making their comeback in early April." The representative continued, "The official release date for their new track will be confirmed soon."


WINNER is preparing for the comeback and has completed filming for 2 music videos abroad. The upcoming album comes 1 year and 2 months since WINNER′s last release and also marks the group′s first album since the departure of Nam Tae Hyun in November 2016.


Meanwhile, WINNER last promoted with their album EXIT : E and tracks Baby Baby and Sentimental in February 2016.


Photo credit: YG Entertainment
showTitle: WINNER to Return as Four Member Group
findKywrd: Kang Seung Yoon (Winner) ,Winner Lee Seung Hoon (Winner) ,Song Min Ho (Winner),Kim Jin Woo (Winner)

newsNm: April to Appear in First Reality Program Since Debut
newsDesc:
Girl group April is appearing in their first reality program since their debut.


On March 14, April′s agency DSP Media stated, "Mnet′s ′April′ is a self-awareness upgrade project to mature as one of the nation′s girl groups. It will be set in 5 parts. In each episode, the girls will carry out a variety of missions based on certain situations and settings."
The upcoming project was produced by Mnet′s digital channel M2. It will be produced in two versions. One version for broadcast and the other for digital platforms.


April′s digital clips will be shared through the M2 channel every Monday. The full version, which will last 1 hour, will air through Mnet every Tuesday. First episodes will air through M2 on April 3 and Mnet on April 4 at 7PM KST.


Photo credit: DSP Media
showTitle: April to Appear in First Reality Program Since Debut

newsNm: Former WINNER Member Nam Tae Hyun Withdraws Charges Regarding Malicious Comments
newsDesc:
Nam Tae Hyun, former member of boy group WINNER, has withdrawn charges regarding malicious comments that have been spreading online.


On March 14, Nam Tae Hyun shared through his personal SNS channels, "First, I would like to apologize to and thank my fans who have been worrying about me. In terms of this matter (malicious comments, rumor spreading, and defamation), I’ve decided to withdraw the charges." Nam Tae Hyun also added, "However, reports and screen captures from the fans are still being collected." The singer also updated fans on his upcoming album by saying, "I am thinking about releasing an album soon. If there are no changes even then, I plan to respond strongly. Thank you."


Previously, on March 7, Nam Tae Hyun wrote through his personal Instagram, "I received a call from the police. Fans have submitted reports of malicious comments and rumors and they need my permission to continue investigating."


Meanwhile, Nam Tae Hyun left the group WINNER in November 2016 and was also released from his agency YG Entertainment.


Photo credit: Nam Tae Hyun Instagram
showTitle: Former WINNER Member Nam Tae Hyun Withdraws Charges Regarding Malicious Comments

newsNm: Minzy to Debut as Solo Artist in April
newsDesc:
Former 2NE1 member Minzy is finally making her solo debut.


On March 15, Minzy′s agency The Music Works revealed, "Minzy is making final preparations with a goal of making her solo debut in late April." Previously, it was revealed that Minzy was collaborating with Jay Park for her upcoming release. The collaboration track will be including in her debut mini album. A representative from her agency shared, "We are still selecting the title track. We have not decided whether Jay Park′s collaboration track will be the title track or not."


Minzy joined The Music Works in March 2016 after her exclusive contract with YG Entertainment ended. The upcoming album marks Minzy′s first solo album since her debut in 2009 with 2NE1.


Meanwhile, Minzy is currently appearing in KBS 2TV′s Sister′s Slam Dunk 2.


Photo credit: Minzy Instagram
showTitle: Minzy to Debut as Solo Artist in April

newsNm: CNBLUE Releases Second Set of Album Images for ′7℃N′
newsDesc:
Boy bang CNBLUE has released a second set of album images for 7℃N.


On March 15, CNBLUE′s agency FNC Entertainment released a second set of album images for the group′s 7th mini album 7℃N through their official teaser website. The newly released album images contrast from the previous images that were set on the beach. In the second set, CNBLUE members look mysterious as they pose in a darker setting.


CNBLUE plans to release their 7th mini album 7℃N on March 20 and will actively promote title track Between Us. Between Us talks about the complicated relationship between a boy and a girl before they become a couple.


The title track Between Us was was composed by member Jung Yong Hwa and composer Justin Reinstein, who has worked with EXO-CBX and Japanese groups Arashi and m-flo. Jung Yong Hwa is credited in 3 tracks in the upcoming album including title track Between Us and tracks It′s You and Royal Rumble.


Meanwhile, CNBLUE′s 7th mini album 7℃N will be available through a variety of music sites on March 20.


Photo credit: FNC Entertainment
showTitle: CNBLUE Releases Second Set of Album Images for ′7℃N′

newsNm: GFriend Wins First Music Program Trophy With ′Fingertip′
newsDesc:
Girl group GFriend has won their first music program trophy with new track Fingertip.


On March 14, GFriend appeared on SBS MTV′s The Show and won their first trophy with title track Fingertip of their 4th mini album. The girl group won their first trophy on the same day as their comeback stage. GFriend is known for their successful title tracks with previous tracks sweeping music program wins. Two of their tracks won more than 10 music program trophies each with Rough winning 15 trophies and Navillera winning 14 trophies. Fans are expectant to see what new record Fingertip will reach.


GFriend′s title track Fingertip of their newly released 4th mini album The Awakening has already topped Korean music charts.


Meanwhile, GFriend will be performing their next stage with Fingertip through MBC Music′s Show Champion on March 15.


Photo credit: GFriend Facebook
showTitle: GFriend Wins First Music Program Trophy With ′Fingertip′

newsNm: 【Special】金來沅錯過一大紅角色 謙虛：他演的好
newsDesc:
金來沅（35歲）14年前就憑MBC《屋塔房小?》、SBS《愛在哈佛》成?一線韓流演員，之後也維持2~3年拍一部電視劇、1年1部電影，不過直到去年，他才迎來演藝事業第2個高峰，與朴信惠合作的SBS《Doctors》以20.2%高收視結局。他?勢追擊，23日以新片《叛獄無間》回歸影壇，受訪時透露曾與「大發(意指:大紅)」的電視擦肩而過。

他說:「我?久沒拍像《Doctors》一樣的浪漫愛情劇，先前有不少愛情劇邀約，但都被我推掉了，甚至有一部紅?天。我不方便說是?一部，那位演員演得?好，所以那部?才會紅。如果由我來演，恐?不會交出這?亮眼的成績單。」

韓國演員都已成?一線電影演員?終極目標，金來沅也不例外，他透露自己在一心想成?一?感녕?亂с喊Τ靜턈octors》的邀約，由於先前沒演過醫生的角色，帶著玩心出演。他開玩笑地說:「?同齡演員一起演?，?舒服也?開心。」實際上，朴信惠小?整整8歲。

金來沅?《Doctors》再度嘗到走紅滋味，他表示:「先前認?電視劇不是我現在的重心，現在打開了心房，就算不是經常，也會邊拍電影邊拍電視劇。」

照片來源:Showbox.
showTitle: 【Special】金來沅錯過一大紅角色 謙虛：他演的好

newsNm: B.A.P力燦操過頭 打歌１周就送醫
newsDesc:

TS娛樂今天(15日)表示:「B.A.P力燦昨天錄完SBS MTV《THE SHOW》之後，因胸口疼痛就醫，到醫院檢?後發現是疲勞性骨折。」、「他不是被猛力衝擊而受傷?而是體重驟降加上回歸前的大量練習，導致肋骨出現裂痕。」

疲勞性骨折患者必須避免運動及做激烈動作，不過力燦本人還是想站在舞台上，經紀公司與他溝通之後決定，繼續站上舞台做宣傳活動，不過不會表演舞蹈。 照片來源:TS娛樂
showTitle: B.A.P力燦操過頭 打歌１周就送醫

newsNm: [Video] ′Produce 101 Season 2′ Contestants Officially Begin Training
newsDesc:
Produce 101 Season 2 contestants have officially begun training and showed their blood, sweat and tears.


During the April 14 episode of Mnet′s Produce 101 Season 2, ratings peaked at 2.2% and viewers showed their real-time support for the contestants through a variety of online platforms.

During the episode, the contestants were seen preparing their stage of Pick Me on M COUNTDOWN, which aired before the start of Produce 101 Season 2. The trainees were placed in groups of A through F according to their agency performances and begun training lessons for each level. Top trainers from the industry, including vocal trainers Lee Suk Hoon and Shin Yumi and dance trainers Kahi and Kwon Jae Seung, individually critiqued each trainee to bring out their best.


The trainees are seen working hard to perfect the vocals and choreography for their theme track Pick Me. Although the trainees are sometimes seen discouraged, they pick themselves up and their passion is seen through the screen.


Next week, the trainees will begin their first camp training sessions. The trainees plan to show their hidden talents and unique charm through the 3rd episode.


Meanwhile, Mnet′s Produce 101 Season 2 airs every Friday evening at 11PM KST.


Check out some clips from the episode and see what′s up for next week!














Photo credit: CJ E&M
showTitle: [Video] ′Produce 101 Season 2′ Contestants Officially Begin Training

newsNm: 男版《PRODUCE 101》收視強強滾 練習生熱血打動觀眾
newsDesc:
Mnet《PRODUCE 101》第2季於14日播出第2集，據AGB尼爾森有線收視調?平均1.9%、最高2.2%，最高點落在D級班練習生練習《我?我（Pick Me）》時，練習生姜東昊面露難色的鏡頭，比第1集更吸睛。

第2集中，練習生們分A到F等級接受量身訓練，?在Mnet《M Countdown》首次表演的《我?我（Pick Me）》做準備。歌唱導師李碩薰、申尤美和舞蹈導師嘉熙、Jason Kwon等一一指導練習生們，?助他們發揮最大實力。

練習生可透過練習《我?我（Pick Me）》獲得升級，因此成員們都?了命地練習，有練習生表現不如自己預期而露出難過神情，令人心疼。

製作單位表示:「第3集將播出，練習生們在首次合宿訓練之後的成長樣貌。」、「練習生接受合宿訓練後，實力有所成長。下周將播出『中心選拔大會』，以及團體對決。敬請期待他們未展現的樣子。」

Mnet《PRODUCE 101》第二季是第一季的豪華版，不僅請到BoA擔任「國民製作人」，也請到SG Wannabe的李碩薰、申尤美指導歌唱，嘉熙和Jason Kwon?導舞蹈，Cheetah和Don Mills傳授饒舌，每周五?上11點(韓國時間)在韓國播出。 照片來源:《PRODUCE 101》截圖
showTitle: 男版《PRODUCE 101》收視強強滾 練習生熱血打動觀眾

newsNm: EXO′s Baek Hyun Tops China′s Music Charts with Solo Track ′Take You Home′
newsDesc:
EXO′s Baek Hyun has topped China′s music charts with his recent solo track.


On April 14, Baek Hyun released a new solo track Take You Home through SM Entertainment′s digital channel STATION Season 2. According to SM Entertainment, Baek Hyun′s solo track Take You Home reached number 1 on top Chinese music site Xiami′s Korean music chart. Additionally, the track also topped the new songs chart in both the combined and Korean charts.


Through this new track, Baek Hyun has gained attention, not only as an EXO members, but also a strong solo vocalist.


Meanwhile, Baek Hyun′s new solo track Take You Home is a soft ballad track was written and composed with the help of musician Cho Gyu Man.


Photo credit: SM Entertainment
showTitle: EXO′s Baek Hyun Tops China′s Music Charts with Solo Track ′Take You Home′
